optionText.en: Trade Credits
Accept gift
Leave for now
Offer gift
How about a break?
How about an assignment?
How about getting to work?
Leave
Gifting records
The storybook is complete!

optionText.cn: 我突然想起还有点事，等我一下。
optionText.en: Wait. I suddenly got something to do.
About the storybook...
More
Return

optionText.cn: 要我帮你拿给他们看吗？
optionText.en: Want me to show it to them?
You know me?
Hello there, Carly.

optionText.cn: 卡莉为什么想要见我呀？
optionText.en: Why do you want to see me, Carly?

optionText.cn: 是有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
optionText.en: Anything I can do to help?
Sure.

optionText.cn: 卡莉想要哪些地方的照片？
optionText.en: What are the places you want to photograph?

optionText.cn: 关于“出逃到水泥丛林的公主”。
optionText.en: About the "Princess who Escaped to the Concrete Jungle".
About the "Very Very Very Tall Tower".

optionText.cn: 关于“被坏术师袭击过的城堡”。
optionText.en: About the "Castle Attacked by the Evil Caster".
About the "Super Big Robot".
About the "Legend of the Lung".
About the "Sapling of the Big, Big Oak of Stone".
About the "Castle of Evil Caster".
What's this "Umbral Monument"?
What's troubling you, Miss Director?
Experience the "Umbral Monument"
Good bye, director.
Gilberta?
You look busy.
What are you looking at?
And these packages...
So that's why you called me here.
Mmkay. How can I help you?

optionText.cn: 所以，你在四号谷地做什么？
optionText.en: So, what are you doing in Valley IV?
Hold on. I need to get prepared.
Alright. Let's go. (Start TIMER)
Hold on. I need to get prepared.
Alright. Let's go. (Start TIMER)
How is it going?
Hold on. I need to get prepared.
Alright. Let's go. (Start TIMER)
Gilberta?
Alright.
Hold on a bit.

optionText.cn: 了不起的摄影师也需要打针。
optionText.en: Great photographers never miss their injections.

optionText.cn: 我是惩罚不愿意打针的小孩的幽灵。
optionText.en: I'm the ghost punisher of children who refuse injections.

optionText.cn: 卡莉有什么喜欢的东西呢？
optionText.en: Is there anything you like, Carly?

optionText.cn: 卡莉想为洁尔佩塔姐姐拍照吗？
optionText.en: Carly, won't you take a photo of Miss Gilberta?
Sure thing.

optionText.cn: 对焦和白平衡都很重要。
optionText.en: You gotta work on the focus and white balance.
You got to have steady hands!
I don't know how I did it. I just pressed the button.
More photos, Gilberta?
What's that you're holding?
How long has he been out?

optionText.cn: 当时他身边带着什么吗？
optionText.en: Was he carrying anything with him?
Got it.
How come?
None of this is your fault.
Stop blaming yourself.
You did more than what's expected of you.
You didn't look very happy back there.
Hmm?

optionText.cn: 没关系，我会和她一起去。
optionText.en: It's alright. I'm going in with her.
Don't worry. I got this covered.
Much appreciated.
Thanks for the warning!
Alright.
Hold on a bit.

optionText.cn: 是裂隙造成了这样的伤痕……
optionText.en: The rift has left a terrible scar...

optionText.cn: 不知道什么时候才能恢复原状。
optionText.en: I wonder when this place will recover.
The Æther and its impact...
Okay. How are we supposed to get up there?
That letter...
I will also treasure these memories.

optionText.cn: 那些记忆会让你害怕吗？
optionText.en: Do those memories frighten you?

optionText.cn: 怎么是这副难过的表情？
optionText.en: You look sad.
What did you find?

optionText.cn: 接过洁尔佩塔递过来的文件
optionText.en: Take the documents from Gilberta.
This diary entry was from...

optionText.cn: 而她不辞而别就是不让罗普……
optionText.en: She left because she didn't want Ropp to...
Who knows?
Well, thankfully you did.
Oh, you really flatter us.
So, what about the password?
...But on the other hand...
Maybe we should ask someone outside.
It might be a pet's name as well.
MASIE is probably the name of his patent.
Can't figure it out. We have too much info.

optionText.cn: 不管是什么，他起名的水平都挺有个性。
optionText.en: MASIE is a pretty unique name for an invention.

optionText.cn: 加上他自己的名字试试？
optionText.en: Try adding his name. ROPP.
We couldn't have done it without the UWST crew.

optionText.cn: 想起来的……和苏醒前的记忆无关。
optionText.en: I recalled ... none of my pre-awakening memories.

optionText.cn: 大多是在四号谷地的事情……
optionText.en: I mostly recalled the events of Valley IV...
Touch it
Observe for a while
What is this place...?
So how should I ... leave this place?
"Remember" what?

optionText.cn: 这一切……究竟是怎么回事？
optionText.en: What exactly ... is all this?

optionText.cn: 我……失忆了，遗忘了很多东西。
optionText.en: I ... I lost my memories. A lot of it, actually.
Did you lose your memories too?

optionText.cn: 源石、信息碎片……这里应该是协议空间内侧。
optionText.en: Originium, data shards... We're in a Protocol Space.
Can you find lost memories here...?
Did that happen a long time ago?

optionText.cn: 很久以前的事……我只记得一场奇异的梦。
optionText.en: I only have a weird dream about the distant past.

optionText.cn: 除此之外，我只有从梦中苏醒后的记忆。
optionText.en: All other memories were made after waking up from it.
Unknown?

optionText.cn: 好像有人在狂热地崇拜某种火焰。
optionText.en: Seems like fanatics who worship some kind of fire.

optionText.cn: 这段祷文上说的……说不定也是一种可能？
optionText.en: Perhaps this prayer described ... a possibility?
You fought in an icefield?

optionText.cn: 我也有过类似的经历……也是在一片雪原……
optionText.en: I have similar experiences in an icefield as well...

optionText.cn: 除了战斗……我好像还肩负着重大的使命……
optionText.en: It was a battle ... and an important mission...

optionText.cn: 不会就是你手里这把吧？
optionText.en: Is it the one you're holding right now?
Are you alright?
Are you hurt?
Who's that thing that looks like you?
What are you doing next?
How did you...

optionText.cn: 她很神秘……在最后，还认出了我是管理员……
optionText.en: She's very mysterious. She even knows I'm the Endmin.

optionText.cn: 我刚刚碰了一下它，然后就到了一片冰原……
optionText.en: I just touched it and found myself in an icefield...

optionText.cn: 我遇到了一位持剑的红发萨卡兹少女……
optionText.en: I met a red-haired Sarkaz girl who wields a sword...

optionText.cn: 我不清楚……只知道她在为自己寻找记忆。
optionText.en: I'm not sure. She's also looking for her memories.
And what?
Fires...? Is she the cause of this?

optionText.cn: 还有一个和她很相似的黑影，在阻止她。
optionText.en: She's also opposed by a shadow that resembles her.

optionText.cn: 嗯，想起了一个同样在寻找记忆的人。
optionText.en: Yeah. Someone looking for lost memories. Like me.
Yes. Did you see them anywhere?
What exactly was that...?

optionText.cn: 他叫罗丹……不久前，我在四号谷地击败了他。
optionText.en: His name is Rhodagn. I defeated him in Valley IV.
I remember what just happened very well!

optionText.cn: 既然是假的……那你为什么还要来这里？
optionText.en: Why are you here if they're false?
Thank you, Laevatain.
Lead the way, Laevatain.

optionText.cn: 嗯。所以我才跟着你的踪迹来到这里。
optionText.en: And I followed your trail to get here.
Fellow companion?
I'm here to find you...

optionText.cn: 嗯，是过去的我在终末地和联盟工团的旧识。
optionText.en: Yes. The old me knew them at Endfield and UWST.

optionText.cn: 嗯，但他们印象里的，还都是苏醒前的我。
optionText.en: Yes, but they remembered me before the hibernation.

optionText.cn: 他们越是信任、越是热情，我就越觉得担心……
optionText.en: Their trust and eagerness make me worried...

optionText.cn: 我无法确定自己还是不是他们期待的那个人。
optionText.en: I don't know if I'm the person they're hoping for.

optionText.cn: 嗯，我负责保护塔塔，一路通过四号谷地。
optionText.en: Yes. I escorted it across Valley IV.

optionText.cn: 嗯，它很擅长扫描侵蚀，对我至关重要。
optionText.en: Yes. It's a very important Blight scanner.

optionText.cn: 如果我失败了，整个四号谷地将遭遇灭顶之灾。
optionText.en: If I fail, Valley IV will face a terrible disaster.

optionText.cn: 你笑什么？别幸灾乐祸了。
optionText.en: Why are you smiling? Stop gloating already.
You get scared, too?

optionText.cn: 但我看不出来……你在害怕什么。
optionText.en: You don't look like you would get scared...
Oh. How did I turn out?
I ... I don't remember.
Maybe ... not, I guess?

optionText.cn: ……我没有办法确定过去究竟是什么样的。
optionText.en: I have no way of knowing what happened in the past.

optionText.cn: 我只是选择了自己希望相信的那一边……
optionText.en: I only chose the facets that I want to believe in...

optionText.cn: 你是不是见过一位红发萨卡兹少女……
optionText.en: Did you see a red-haired Sarkaz girl...?

optionText.cn: 我想打听一位擅长使用火焰和大剑的红发少女……
optionText.en: Seen a red-haired girl who wields fire and a greatsword?
Sure. The Bridge is over there.
Excellent?

optionText.cn: 但我……没办法立即再度踏上寻找记忆的旅途。
optionText.en: But I can't start another memory search right now.

optionText.cn: 先说说看吧，我也有我自己想确认的事情。
optionText.en: Tell me more. I intend to dig further into it, actually.

optionText.cn: 协议奇点……就像我第一次遇见她那样？
optionText.en: Protocol Singularity ... like the first time I met her?
I'll find Laevatain.

optionText.cn: 我和她还有一个关于记忆的约定。
optionText.en: We made a promise about memories.
Time to find her.
Wait for a bit.
You look a little tired.
Did you find more "memories"?

optionText.cn: 发现那个“她”的踪迹了吗？
optionText.en: Did you find "her" trail?

optionText.cn: 我也不会，所以我来这儿了。
optionText.en: Nothing for me either. That's why I'm here.

optionText.cn: 我也承诺，帮你找回记忆的真相。
optionText.en: And I promise to find the truth in your memories.

optionText.cn: 帝江号，终末地的基地，也就是“家”。
optionText.en: Dijiang. The Endfield HQ. "Home".
The home I forgot about.
It's her. She's here again.

optionText.cn: 这样的记忆……很值得珍视。
optionText.en: Memories like that should be treasured.

optionText.cn: 嗯，我在四号谷地救了她。
optionText.en: Yes. I saved her in Valley IV.

optionText.cn: 她很喜欢画画，画得很好。
optionText.en: She likes to draw and has a gift for it.
In the icefield.
In the Valley Fort.
In other people's memories.
Ginny? Are you here, too?

optionText.cn: 是碾骨氏族。在聂菲斯的率领下，挑起了危机。
optionText.en: Bonekrushers led by Nefarith. They created a crisis.
I do so to protect Valley IV.
I'm here to help Laevatain.
I'm just going with the flow...

optionText.cn: 你在那些记忆里……是什么样的？
optionText.en: And what were you like ... in those memories?
You'll figure it all out.

optionText.cn: 似乎有……但又有点不对劲。
optionText.en: I think so ... but this doesn't feel right.
Your injuries are getting worse...

optionText.cn: 我们会一起走出这里的。像第一次遇见时那样。
optionText.en: We'll leave this place, just like our first meeting.
You found a clue?
Blue
Green
Red
She probably walked past this place...
Laevatain.
Surtr.
{player}.
I'm looking for someone...
For survival.
For her memories.
For vengeance.

optionText.cn: 你知道莱万汀的踪迹吗？
optionText.en: Do you know where Laevatain is?

optionText.cn: 她是再旅者，穿越时空而来的伙伴。
optionText.en: A reconvener and companion beyond space and time.

optionText.cn: 她是帮助过我走出迷途的指引者。
optionText.en: A guide who helped me out of my confusion.

optionText.cn: 她是和我有过约定，一起寻找记忆的同行者。
optionText.en: An oath-bound companion of our memory search.
Are you alright?
Laevatain?
But what?
What's happening?
Sounds like we'll be getting quite a fight.

optionText.cn: 其他再旅者需要记忆，用来传承身份和认同。
optionText.en: They need memories for the legacy and identity.

optionText.cn: 而留给你的，或许就是一场“与记忆的告别”。
optionText.en: Perhaps you're meant to say "goodbye" to them.

optionText.cn: 让你最终打破记忆的桎梏，重塑新的自我。
optionText.en: You broke their shackles and forged a new identity.

optionText.cn: 伊冯的包裹跟她一样有个性。
optionText.en: Yvonne's package has plenty of character, just like her.

optionText.cn: “超级迭代人”……伊冯平时这么称呼自己吗？
optionText.en: Super Iterator... She calls herself this?

optionText.cn: 安德烈让我帮你取个包裹。
optionText.en: Andre asked me to pick up a package for you.

optionText.cn: 你有快递到了，快打开看看吧。
optionText.en: You got a delivery. Open it.
Is it a package of research samples?
No use for it anymore?
What were you planning to use it for?
Graffiti?
Is this a prank?
I guess I'll leave my mark.

optionText.cn: 早就看这图案不顺眼了。
optionText.en: Agreed. The bad art is hurting my eyes.
So, what do I look like right now?

optionText.cn: 你也总是让我出乎意料。
optionText.en: You've been quite surprising to me as well.

optionText.cn: 刚才说不怕被抓的是谁？
optionText.en: Someone told me she was not afraid of getting caught.
I thought someone was supposed to cover me.
How about a fragment of my memories?
An old friend, perhaps...
Visual impact is the only thing that counts.
The Hub Base has plenty of good ones, actually.

optionText.cn: 第一次见到锚点的地方。
optionText.en: The place where I first saw an Ankhor.

optionText.cn: 好啊，那就一起去安德烈的实验室找点灵感。
optionText.en: Great. Let's get inspiration from Andre's lab.
I'm actually busy with something else...
What about you, Yvonne? Got anything to "scream" about?
Are you going to draw me? I'm a little shy, you know.
It was a difficult battle.
Tata did help us out afterwards.

optionText.cn: 要不是塔塔，这些孩子就……
optionText.en: It was Tata. Without it, these children would be...
No trouble at all.

optionText.cn: 我希望她能一直这样开心。
optionText.en: I hope she can stay happy.
I'm pretty curious about her past.
And so she came to Endfield.
What did she say?
Now I'm curious about her answer.

optionText.cn: 我们也希望伊冯能开心。
optionText.en: We want Yvonne to be happy.

optionText.cn: 伊冯也让我们感到开心。
optionText.en: Yvonne is making us happy too.

optionText.cn: 伊冯在为一幅作品收集灵感。
optionText.en: Yvonne is collecting inspiration for her work.
We're making a painting together.

optionText.cn: 别紧张，我们是来找灵感的。
optionText.en: Don't worry. We're here to look for inspiration.

optionText.cn: 这次不是来兴师问罪的。
optionText.en: We're not here to blame anyone.
Sure. I can help.
I guess I gotta bounce for a while, Yvonne.

optionText.cn: 她拿那个在园区里画涂鸦呢。
optionText.en: She made graffiti with the paint.

optionText.cn: 伊冯想让我帮忙一起完成作品。
optionText.en: Yvonne wants me to help complete her work.

optionText.cn: 那个涂料有什么特别之处吗？
optionText.en: Is there something special about that paint?
I didn't see you stopping her.
Sure. Let's go.
I actually want to look around some more.
Sure. Let's go.
I actually want to look around some more.
Your speed is incredible...
Things seem to have worked out.
Sure thing.
I'm actually curious myself...
The price when you're working with a genius...
It's really loud and boisterous.

optionText.cn: 有三个锚点的矿脉源区。
optionText.en: There's the Origin Lodespring with three Ankhors.

optionText.cn: 我们在矿脉源区遇到一个巨大的天使。
optionText.en: We met a giant Aggelos at the Origin Lodespring.

optionText.cn: 超域爆发对这片区域影响很大。
optionText.en: The Æther rupture really affected this place.

optionText.cn: 重建工作还需要一段时间。
optionText.en: Rebuilding will take a while.
I don't see Alia around...

optionText.cn: 阿丽娅好像不在，在周围打听下？
optionText.en: Alia isn't around. I'll ask the people.
The Send-Off?
I don't see Alia anywhere.

optionText.cn: 阿丽娅也在筹备仪式吗？
optionText.en: Is Alia helping out in the ceremony?
Did you see Alia?
Hide and seek? I'm an expert in that.
Great. Double Manglers! Attack!

optionText.cn: 你肯定有办法关掉它，对吧。
optionText.en: You know how to switch it off, right?
Is this ... navigable?
Did you design this?
Yeah. I thought about that before.
Yeah. I've actually seen it before.

optionText.cn: 这扇门一看就是你设计的。
optionText.en: This gate is obviously designed by you.

optionText.cn: 这也是你做的防御装置？
optionText.en: Did you build these defenses as well?
What's this place...?

optionText.cn: 但是我们快被天使包围了。
optionText.en: But we're almost surrounded by the Aggeloi.
An idea? Now...?
Yvonne, about these problems we had...
Thanks. You've been a great help to us.

optionText.cn: 好，我一定会站在你这边。
optionText.en: Of course. I'll definitely be on your side.
I gotta keep you safe.

optionText.cn: 我不能让伙伴陷入危险。
optionText.en: Can't afford to expose a friend to danger.
What are your plans for the future?
I have my own mission.

optionText.cn: 有很多事情我还需要搞清楚。
optionText.en: Figure things out. A lot of things.

optionText.cn: 因为我也想看到涂鸦完成。
optionText.en: Because I want to see the complete graffiti.

optionText.cn: 我很高兴能帮上你的忙。
optionText.en: And I'm happy to help.
Of course.
What about me?
I forgot a lot of things myself.
Interesting. Is the Endmin still the Endmin?
I'm with you all the way.

optionText.cn: 看来要被征用更多时间了。
optionText.en: Seems like I'll be investing major time in this.
No problem.
Come on then, Bytee.
These look like UWST designs.
Fabian is going to arrest you.
Something you want to "scream" about.
Press the play button.
Another graffiti?
Found your inspiration so quickly?
Don't worry. Yvonne and I will take care of it.
I'm fully prepared as well.
I'll need some time to prepare.
You're right.
Where are we headed next?
You hacked the thing really quick.
Yeah. Let's go!
I want to look around some more.
The only one? Wouldn't you feel alone?

optionText.cn: 这些都是你一个人做的？
optionText.en: Did you make all these on your own?
Not going in?
You seem troubled by something.

optionText.cn: 无论如何，我都会陪你的。
optionText.en: I'm right beside you, no matter what happens.
This place must be...
Is this where you first designed Tata?
So the paints were actually meant for...

optionText.cn: 原来是塔塔的涂装颜料。
optionText.en: They turned out to be Tata's coating.

optionText.cn: 这里对你来说确实意义非凡。
optionText.en: This place means a lot to you.
Thanks for taking me here.
Let's go.
I still want to look around the place.

optionText.cn: 底下的天使都清理干净了。
optionText.en: Got rid of the bugs in your basement.
You can take over the cleanup work.
You got tons of friends!
Just say hi and you're welcome!
First time?

optionText.cn: 我们都很难接受塔塔的离去……
optionText.en: All of us found it hard to accept that Tata had left us...

optionText.cn: 碾骨氏族的人在重建他们的地盘……
optionText.en: The Bonekrushers are rebuilding their turf...

optionText.cn: 也许他们会有什么线索。
optionText.en: They might have some clues.

optionText.cn: 乔万尼会给我们真正的“线索”吗？
optionText.en: Will Giovanni give us a proper "clue"?
I'm good at that.
I am your partner, after all.
What's happening here?
Are the Landbreakers behind it all?

optionText.cn: 你还记得他们说了什么吗？
optionText.en: Do you remember what they talked about?
You're talking about ... team combat?
What do you think, Wulfgard?
Everyone seems to trust you a lot.
You're getting really busy.

optionText.cn: 就出了你说的那件“要紧事”？
optionText.en: You didn't expect that "emergency" to happen?

optionText.cn: 交给我吧，我会把他带回来的。
optionText.en: Leave it to me. I'll bring him back.
Is this a ... <@qu.key>tracker</>?
Sure. Let's go.
Let me make some preparations.

optionText.cn: 还要继续陪他演下去吗？
optionText.en: Should we keep playing along with the show?
You can read them?
So I guess ... there are other tricks involved?
You hesitated back then.

optionText.cn: 你其实并没真的将他视作“敌人”。
optionText.en: You never treated him as an actual enemy.

optionText.cn: 我认识的“狼卫”，从不给敌人机会。
optionText.en: The Wulfgard I knew never left anything to chance.

optionText.cn: 但你依然怀揣了某种侥幸，对吗……
optionText.en: But you're hoping for something, right...?

optionText.cn: 别再犯让洛茜担心的老毛病了。
optionText.en: Stop making Rossi worry about you again.
Hey, I'm your partner. Don't forget that.
I think I smell fuel.

optionText.cn: 铳果然是适合你的武器。
optionText.en: Guns fit you very well.

optionText.cn: 不必言不由衷，这不像你。
optionText.en: There's no need to hide the truth. This isn't you.
...Let's head out first.
You're ... laying Giovanni to rest?
How should I find you?
But something else has just begun.
You don't want Rossi to know?

optionText.cn: 这只怀表呢？也是托马索送的？
optionText.en: How about this pocket watch? Is that from Tommaso as well?
Need some help?
Rossi got me this job to look for you.
Your sister is worried.
Looks like a trap.
Someone is out to get you.

optionText.cn: 这就是你不惜以身犯险的理由？
optionText.en: Is this why you're investigating this on your own?
Are you going after the trail?

optionText.cn: 可你已经是终末地的一员。
optionText.en: But you are an Endfielder.

optionText.cn: 我答应了洛茜要带你回去。
optionText.en: I promised Rossi to take you back.

optionText.cn: 和你收到的那个包裹有关？
optionText.en: This has something to do with the package you received, right?

optionText.cn: 你和狼卫认识多少年了？
optionText.en: How long have you known Wulfgard?
Can you tell me about Tommaso?
What do you think about the Bonekrushers?
No questions from me.
You think he's the traitor?
You want to bag them all at once?
Since you're so honest about it...
Piece of cake.
Can you tell me about Tommaso?
When can we get going?

optionText.cn: 害死他的人……会是乔万尼吗？
optionText.en: Can Giovanni be the one ... who killed him?
Let's go.
I need to make a few preparations.
Interference is too strong...
I can't really do whatever I want in that place.

optionText.cn: 但它还是会把我赶出去。
optionText.en: But it still managed to kick me out.

optionText.cn: 我可没觉得自己在里面很受欢迎。
optionText.en: The insides weren't very welcoming, FYI.
It can do that?

optionText.cn: 查看委托与辅助探测技术
optionText.en: View Commissions and Exploration Support Tech
What's our next goal?

optionText.cn: 得先解除拦在前面的“墙”了。
optionText.en: Gotta eliminate this "wall", it seems.
Did the portal change its looks?
It looks kinda like the "key target"...
So, do we keep exploring it?
Done? I didn't get anything.
How about the tools?
Sounds convenient.

optionText.cn: 厂房、机器、天使、裂地者……没错。
optionText.en: Factories, machines, Aggeloi, Landbreakers... That's right.

optionText.cn: 它们像是那些东西的扭曲版本。
optionText.en: They felt like twisted versions of my Valley IV encounters.
Is this unusual?
Enter "Valley's Aberrants"
Leave

optionText.cn: 需要我收集更多样本吗？
optionText.en: Need me to collect more samples?
Sounds like a major undertaking.
Getting compensated aboard Dijiang...?

optionText.cn: 其实我直接来帮忙也行……
optionText.en: I won't mind doing this pro bono...
Hello?
Are you Aquito?

optionText.cn: 没想到帝江号上也有协议空间。
optionText.en: Didn't expect Dijiang to have a Protocol Space.

optionText.cn: 看得出来，这个研究很吸引你。
optionText.en: You are obviously interested in this research.
...That's very straight forward.

optionText.cn: 确实不能忽视帝江号上的风险。
optionText.en: Right. Gotta keep Dijiang safe and risk-free.
Time to dive in and see what's what.
Agreed. Let's get started!
Give me a moment to prepare.
Explore "Valley's Aberrants"

optionText.cn: 查看委托与辅助探测技术
optionText.en: View Commissions and Exploration Support Tech
View Operation Metrics
Leave

optionText.cn: 我可是刚打完一场恶仗……
optionText.en: And I just fought a really hard battle...
How about some TLC for your Endmin?
...I'm fine. Much appreciated.
But the nearby roads are blocked.

optionText.cn: 现在我需要一些爆炸物。
optionText.en: Explosives are what I need right now.
Rocks are in the way. Big rocks.

optionText.cn: 你果然更关心实验对吧……
optionText.en: You're really interested in the research...
Did we make any progress?
Aquito...? You there?
Sounds great to me.
I think so, for now...
...I'm still seeing two of you.

optionText.cn: 事故发生时，帝江号在做什么？
optionText.en: What was Dijiang doing when the incident took place?

optionText.cn: 给我最近的舰船状态日志。
optionText.en: Give me the latest vessel status log.

optionText.cn: 你的脸色不太好，佩丽卡。
optionText.en: You don't look very well, Perlica.
Is that a dangerous place?

optionText.cn: 原因很可能就出在那里。
optionText.en: That may very well be the cause of this.
Sounds like a touchy, sensitive thing...

optionText.cn: 总不能因此停下常规工作吧。
optionText.en: But we can't stop our work because of this, right?
So, any solutions so far?
Treasure vault?

optionText.cn: 等我回来之后，完整解释一下。
optionText.en: Give me the complete details once I come back.
What is it?
Is there something on my face?
You seem rather happy.
Okay. Let's do that again in non-scientific jargon.
Does that include removing Ætherside influences?
Sounds like a valuable strategic asset.

optionText.cn: 一路的辛苦总算有回报了……
optionText.en: All these exploration dives finally paid off...
We got more enemies.
Hope we have enough time.
Sounds like a major undertaking.
This thing looks quite ... familiar to me.

optionText.cn: 我应该见过它，但我不记得了。
optionText.en: I think I saw this before, but I can't really remember.
What is it?
Do we have a situation, Aquito?
The ambient "vibe" just changed.

optionText.cn: 总觉得这里变“通畅”了一点。
optionText.en: This place feels a bit more "open" now.
I should check around the place.
...This place looks quite familiar.
This looks like a weird place.
Aquito?

optionText.cn: 我在外面没见过这样的。
optionText.en: I've never seen anything like this in realspace.
It's giving off some really strange vibes...
I also happen to be blocked by a "wall".
What should I do now?

optionText.cn: 我试着碰了一下那东西。
optionText.en: I tried touching it.

optionText.cn: 剩下的能量反应在哪里？
optionText.en: Where are the rest of the energy reactions?
How many times should I "touch" it?
Where are we needed?
Engineering Division?

optionText.cn: 听起来不像是“修会”该做的。
optionText.en: Engineering doesn't sound like a ... Cabal job.

optionText.cn: 从那里出来还没几天呢。
optionText.en: I just came out of that place for a few days.

optionText.cn: 短期内我还不打算躺回去。
optionText.en: I don't intend to take another stasis nap any time soon.
What is it?

optionText.cn: 寂语修会似乎和我们走得很近。
optionText.en: The Cabal of Tranquility seems like a close partner of ours.
It seems to be ... calling out to me.
Can I really do it?

optionText.cn: 我的失忆是不是耽误了许多任务？
optionText.en: My memory loss seems bad for many of our missions.

optionText.cn: 我有资格承受你们的使命吗？
optionText.en: Am I qualified to lead your vision?
This comes at quite a surprise...

optionText.cn: 抱歉，你的负担一定很重。
optionText.en: I'm sorry. There must be a huge weight on your shoulders.
Thank you.
It is my honor.

optionText.cn: 塔卫二……我需要了解它的什么呢？
optionText.en: Talos-II... Is there anything I need to know about it?
Repeat itself...?

optionText.cn: 这样的人，以前存在过吗？
optionText.en: Has there ever been anyone like her?
It's alright, Perlica.
Everyone's lending me their support.

optionText.cn: 只有前进才能带来改变。
optionText.en: We must pursue progress to bring about change.

optionText.cn: 不能永远活在敌人的阴影下。
optionText.en: We cannot always live in the enemy's shadow.
I'm still good for the mission. What about you?

optionText.cn: 这就是塔卫二对我的欢迎仪式么？
optionText.en: Seems like a warm welcome from Talos-II.
"THE" Endministrator?

optionText.cn: 你们平时是怎么看待我的？
optionText.en: I wonder how do people talk about me. Just curious.
Time to "thank" these rocky crawlies for their warm welcome.

optionText.cn: 总不能坐视终末地的成员涉险。
optionText.en: And I won't let my Endfielders face the dangers alone.
Tell me about these Ankhors...
How badly damaged is the Base?
I have no more questions.

optionText.cn: 我们应该破坏那个发光结构吗？
optionText.en: Should we try to break that glowing structure?

optionText.cn: 请尽快返回中控塔避难。
optionText.en: Head to the Control Tower for safety. Quickly.
The place is still dangerous.
Precise and deadly. Very impressive.

optionText.cn: 落地能再稳健一点就好了。
optionText.en: You can use a better, more stable landing.
Well met. Pleasure working with you.
Yeah. Sorry about that.
My memory loss is a very real thing.
Don't worry. I can handle them.

optionText.cn: 我不能光看着你们涉险。
optionText.en: I can't simply let you face the dangers alone.
I'm an Endfielder. I do Endfield stuff.
Tell me more about Ankhors.

optionText.cn: 这台原型机是怎么回事？
optionText.en: What is this Prototype?
What did we work on in the past?
I have no more questions.
Are you alright? Did you get hurt?
How's the UWST doing?
I see a good opportunity for some warm-ups.
I just hope they can stop their blabbering...
What do you know about it?
You seem rather excited.
Sounds like a very practical idea.

optionText.cn: 我开始明白它的用途了。
optionText.en: I think I'm starting to know how it works.
Is he...?
It remembers you?
Yvonne...
I shall do my best and plead your case.
Ah, well. Good luck, I guess.
Miracles?
These Originium and machinery...
Let me try something.

optionText.cn: 现在不是考虑负担的时候。
optionText.en: This isn't the time to get worried about health.

optionText.cn: 可现在火烧眉毛了，对吧？
optionText.en: Desperate times call for desperate solutions, right?

optionText.cn: 我们不能只是坐在这里。
optionText.en: We shouldn't just sit around at this place.
I say we head out there and seize the initiative.
We can easily handle the Landbreakers.
We'll get to the bottom of this.

optionText.cn: 而且还没有看到工人们。
optionText.en: And where are all the crew mates?

optionText.cn: 那台原型机是做什么用的？
optionText.en: What is that Prototype for anyway?

optionText.cn: 这台原型机被裂地者盯上了。
optionText.en: The Landbreakers seem to be hunting your Prototype.

optionText.cn: 裂地者似乎想抢夺这批零件。
optionText.en: The Landbreakers seem to be interested in the parts.
It seems odd and rather suspicious to me.
You're the Landbreaker specialist?

optionText.cn: 就像枢纽区基地遭遇的那样。
optionText.en: This feels like something we encountered back at the Hub Base.
What's a denstack?
You recognize that thing?
Blight? Æther energy?

optionText.cn: 裂地者似乎在寻找这里的居民。
optionText.en: The Landbreakers seem to be searching for the local residents.
Where should we go next?
Who's this Nefarith?
Could the local residents be...
We must help him.

optionText.cn: 他们也许知道更多情况。
optionText.en: They probably know more about the local situation.

optionText.cn: 源石会以这种方式感染人体？
optionText.en: Does Originium infect people this way?
But we're cultivating Originium...

optionText.cn: 那些裂地者都做了什么？
optionText.en: What did those breakers do to you?
How did you get here?
You can't live in a cave forever.
I have a feeling you got an idea.
What is it, Perlica?
What would I've done in the past?
What's the usual Endfield approach?
That's right.
Sounds like my type of approach.
We can help as well.
The awesome Supervisor of Endfield Industries.

optionText.cn: 就再给他们一点颜色瞧瞧！
optionText.en: We'll give them what they want. Another battle!
Of course you can.

optionText.cn: 我想，这就是佩丽卡的计划。
optionText.en: I believe this is Perlica's plan all along.
...What is this?
You know what this is?
It feels pretty familiar to me...
I'm diving in for a look.

optionText.cn: 没关系，后面的事情我们能搞定。
optionText.en: It's alright. We'll take it from here.
Uncle Mark?

optionText.cn: 看来有必要做些深入调查了。
optionText.en: We need to thoroughly investigate this place.
What are you worried about?
So they use the "Blight" and worship the "Æther"?

optionText.cn: 你们的关系似乎不怎么样。
optionText.en: You don't seem to like them very much.
They're probably thinking about mischief.
Very brave, but you should be more cautious.
That voice can be quite annoying.
Fortunately, Wulfgard is after them as we speak.
The "side opposing the origins of life"...
Take these mineral ores.
I need to take care of something else.
Leave that to us.

optionText.cn: 这就是集成工业系统存在的原因。
optionText.en: That's what the AIC Factory is for.
Here they are. Hope they fit.
I need to take care of something else.
Here they are.
I need to take care of something else.
That means you got some bad news for us.

optionText.cn: 有什么不顺利的部分吗？
optionText.en: Did something bad happen?
What is it?

optionText.cn: 可惜没能阻止他们摧毁道路。
optionText.en: If only we stopped them from blowing up the bridge.
How important is that place?
An Æther Test Site?
Blight reactions?

optionText.cn: 应该还有工团成员在供能高地。
optionText.en: Some UWST personnel may still be at the Power Plateau.
We must initiate rescue operations at once.

optionText.cn: 我们该怎么用它消除侵蚀？
optionText.en: How do we use the Prototype to eliminate the Blight?
I'm the Endministrator of Endfield Industries.
What happened at the Science Park?
Greet
Give Tata a head rub
Check Tata's systems

optionText.cn: 在这里能看到裂隙被撕开的场景……
optionText.en: You probably saw how the rift appeared from here...
How goes your SAR operations?

optionText.cn: 需要联系枢纽区基地吗？
optionText.en: Should we contact the Hub Base?
Tata, you alright?
Wakey-wakey, little bot. How about a head rub?
No. I just gave it a head rub.

optionText.cn: 那不如一起行动，互相照应？
optionText.en: Why don't we move as a team?

optionText.cn: 从激光机关和无人机来看……
optionText.en: Well, judging from these laser traps and bomber drones...

optionText.cn: 伊冯或许能自己守住的。
optionText.en: Maybe Yvonne has laid down effective defenses.

optionText.cn: 之前接触基地信号天线的时候，我就感觉到了。
optionText.en: I felt it when I touched that radio antenna at the Hub Base.

optionText.cn: 信号塔能放大的不止是通讯信号。
optionText.en: That tower will amplify more than just our radio signals.

optionText.cn: 把塔塔和信号塔连到一起的话……
optionText.en: Perhaps we can connect Tata to the signal tower...

optionText.cn: 通过协议技术，可以直接扩大扫描范围。
optionText.en: Techno-Protocol can expand its scanning range.

optionText.cn: 被困在这么危险的楼里……
optionText.en: Imagine being trapped in such a dangerous building...

optionText.cn: 听起来，伊冯倒不是很在乎自己的安危。
optionText.en: Yvonne doesn't really care about personal safety.

optionText.cn: 这话我最近听的次数有点多……
optionText.en: I've been hearing a lot of that lately...

optionText.cn: 没人能预想到会变成现在的局面。
optionText.en: No one knew it would look as ultra-bad as this.
Now that we're talking about your machine...

optionText.cn: 还是来看看你的“宝贝小车”吧。
optionText.en: We should take a look at your "baby bot".
I did.
Perlica did.
This one right here. Chen.

optionText.cn: 有什么我可以帮到你的吗？
optionText.en: Thanks. Is there anything I can help?
I'm not really in the mood for a break.
Leave it to me.
I hope I can guess your taste.
Retro style vinyl
Brand new, unopened vinyl

optionText.cn: 看你的样子就能猜出来。
optionText.en: Your style gave it all away.

optionText.cn: 根据你房间的风格猜出来的。
optionText.en: Your techno-science-cave made it super obvious.

optionText.cn: 塔塔……你的“宝贝小车”也是在这里组装的吗？
optionText.en: Did you build Tata ... I mean, baby bot, here?
Alrighty. Lead the way.
Hold on. I need to get prepared.
Alright. Let's be off.
Hold on. I need to get prepared.
Yvonne calls it her baby bot.

optionText.cn: 每个人都对它有自己的叫法呢。
optionText.en: Everyone has a nickname for it.
Understood.
So, let's take a break.

optionText.cn: 我们在寻找一名叫艾尔法斯的搜救队队员。
optionText.en: We're looking for an SAR crew mate named Alfass.
We're good for now.
What's the sitch at this place?
Tell me about your work...
Tell me about Rossi...
I have nothing to ask.

optionText.cn: 别着急，先说说是怎么一回事。
optionText.en: Slow down. Tell me what happened first.
I planted this...?
I planted this...?

optionText.cn: 我没事……好像听到了一些声音。
optionText.en: No, I'm okay... I think I'm hearing voices in my head.
Erm... We didn't do much, actually.
You know me?

optionText.cn: 看来洛茜在这里人缘很好嘛。
optionText.en: It seems that Rossi made a lot of friends here.

optionText.cn: 我们在寻找一名叫艾尔法斯的搜救队员。
optionText.en: We're looking for an SAR crew mate named Alfass.
We're good for now.

optionText.cn: 我们不是才分开没多久？
optionText.en: A while? We left just moments ago.
We're about to move out.

optionText.cn: 冷静一点，你在这里很安全。
optionText.en: Calm down. You're at a safe place.
You're working really hard.

optionText.cn: 你对塔塔的表情已经解读得这么深了吗？
optionText.en: You seem to have a good understanding of Tata's emotes.

optionText.cn: 想赶紧抵达协议信号塔？
optionText.en: Wanna reach the Protocol Signal Tower quickly?

optionText.cn: 想看看陈千语的新剑招？
optionText.en: Wanna check out Chen's new moves?
I got no idea what this means.
Now that emote is super obvious.
Who, me?

optionText.cn: 我觉得原理应该不是这样……
optionText.en: That's theoretically unsound...
Now that's quite a wild speculation...
Enough already... This is getting way out of my league.
I'm sorry. Are you disappointed?
What happened out there?

optionText.cn: 红色的异光不是从这几个锚点发出的。
optionText.en: The strange red light is not emitted by the Ankhors.

optionText.cn: 大树残骸里，肯定还有什么东西在蠢蠢欲动。
optionText.en: Something lurks in the ruins of the Great Oak.

optionText.cn: 我说不好，但是摸上去的时候，我感觉……
optionText.en: I'm not sure, but when I touched them...

optionText.cn: 它们和普通源石的内部结构不太一样。
optionText.en: I sensed differences in their structures.

optionText.cn: 和残枝不一样，它看起来是“活着”的……
optionText.en: It's not like the other branches. This one looks alive...
Let's pray that the sapling grows to be a strong tree.
Very beautiful indeed...

optionText.cn: 它们，也和当初的我有关？
optionText.en: Was I ... responsible for this as well?
Thinking about me?
The fight with the giant Aggelos affected you.
(Better leave them alone...)
Ready to roll.
Not yet. Give me some time.

optionText.cn: 天空中的裂隙仿佛近在咫尺……
optionText.en: The rift in the sky seems so very close...

optionText.cn: 前面就是我们的目的地。
optionText.en: That's exactly where we're headed.
Everyone's taken good care of me.

optionText.cn: 发电站和超域试验场，这两处地方……
optionText.en: The Power Plant and the Æther Test Site...
Director Qin mentioned these two places.

optionText.cn: 我很在意他刚才的警告。
optionText.en: He warned us. It sounds serious.
You shouldn't blame yourself.

optionText.cn: 你们不必以这样的方式承担责任。
optionText.en: You don't have to go so far to bear this burden.
You know me?
We heard about your plan.

optionText.cn: 你似乎在做一件很极端的事。
optionText.en: You seem to be planning something extreme.

optionText.cn: 裂地者不值得让你和他们同归于尽。
optionText.en: You're worth far more than the Landbreakers.

optionText.cn: 不需要任何人牺牲，我们就是为此而来。
optionText.en: No one needs to sacrifice themselves. It's why we're here.
We can do it.
Leave that to us.

optionText.cn: 我会把东西和他们一起带回来的。
optionText.en: I will return here with the thing and your people.
Tell me your entire plan.

optionText.cn: 源石发电站里发生了什么？
optionText.en: What happened at the Originium Power Plant?
How much do you know about Tata in its current form?
I have nothing to ask.
I will seal that rift.

optionText.cn: 你怎么看待克劳的计划？
optionText.en: What do you think about Crowe's plan?
About the blood on the keycard...
I have no more questions.

optionText.cn: 放心，我们一定会带你完成使命。
optionText.en: Don't worry. We'll help you complete your mission safely.
Have no fear. Leave it to us.
I'm ready.
Not yet. Give me some time.
I'm ready.
Not yet. Give me some time.
This isn't your fault.
I'm very sorry...

optionText.cn: 好在终末地不是孤军奋战。
optionText.en: Thank goodness Endfield is not fighting alone.
A big thank you to everyone who stood by their posts.

optionText.cn: 我们一起挺过了最困难的时刻。
optionText.en: We've endured a most difficult tribulation as one.

optionText.cn: 集成工业系统也帮了大忙。
optionText.en: The AIC Factory really helped.
The research proved very useful.
I'll leave it in your good hands.
Looking forward to the results.
Is the Valley safe now?
How should we start rebuilding the region?
The sitch sounds better than I thought.
Right.
Work-life balance is indeed important.
You'll get your chance.

optionText.cn: 要不现在就加入危机处理小组？
optionText.en: Wanna sign up to the Crisis Team?
We need to ask your brother.

optionText.cn: 现在的狼群不能没有你。
optionText.en: The Pack needs you now more than ever.

optionText.cn: 请你盯紧碾骨氏族的动向。
optionText.en: Please keep your eyes on the Bonekrushers.

optionText.cn: 专业的事情就交给专家来办。
optionText.en: A professional job reserved for true professionals.

optionText.cn: 也辛苦你一直组织抵抗。
optionText.en: Thank you for organizing the resistance.
You made major contributions as well.
United, we can defeat every challenge.
Everyone gave their best.
Still thinking about Tata?
Too many things just happened.

optionText.cn: 危机处理小组的任务还多着呢。
optionText.en: The Crisis Team still has plenty of missions.
I can't approve your leave request.
"From the legends"?
Interesting way to start a conversation.

optionText.cn: 在研究园，你们已经是英雄了。
optionText.en: You're already heroes at the Science Park.

optionText.cn: 没有它的时候，这里很美。
optionText.en: Now that it's no more, this place looks pretty beautiful.
Everything feels alright to me.
I'm feeling okay.
You don't need to worry about me.
I'm doing fine.
And you've been very strong.
You've worked really hard.
The PAC has helped plenty of people.
The PAC proved its usefulness.
We shall see our duty till the very end.
That's why you didn't show up at the Control Tower.
Got any plans?
The Power Plant is safe.
We actually didn't do much...
He actually lives...
This isn't over.
The troublemaker has come back to haunt us.

optionText.cn: 这个“莱西娅”，曾经在终末地？
optionText.en: This Lycia is an ex-Endfielder?

optionText.cn: 我们刚刚见到了一位老朋友？
optionText.en: I guess we met an old friend back then.

optionText.cn: 莱西娅为什么要进行这场“狩猎”？
optionText.en: Why is Lycia so intent on pursuing this hunt?
I'll remember her name.

optionText.cn: 既然是约定，将来一定还会见面的。
optionText.en: If it's a promise, it means we'll meet again.
Guess there's no break time for us.
Things just keep happening, don't they?
Go easy on him.
At least he paid for the spare parts.

optionText.cn: 重建工作会是个大工程。
optionText.en: Rebuilding will be a major undertaking.
How's the sitch?

optionText.cn: 直接接入协议同步器吗？
optionText.en: Are we directly connecting it to our Protosyncs?

optionText.cn: 我没有料到会是这个大小。
optionText.en: I didn't expect it to come in this size.

optionText.cn: 你说得很轻松，会有风险吗？
optionText.en: Sounds easy and all, but ... is this dangerous?
Beautifully done.
It'll be a game-changer.
Nefarith remains a threat.

optionText.cn: 我们需要搞清楚她的真实目的。
optionText.en: We need to figure out her true goals.
Yvonne, actually...
My condolences.
There'll be no sacrifices next time.
Let us begin.
They are true.
I actually wish I could remember more.
You do not seem surprised.
The Æther connects each of these "isolated" incidents...
We must be fully prepared.
Are you alright?
Good job.
Go ahead and do your thing.
I'll wait for you here.

optionText.cn: 四号谷地暂时应该安全了。
optionText.en: Valley IV should be safe for now.
What should we do next...?
Nefarith, the PAC, and the Æther...
Civilization Band, Talos-II...
Who am I...?
I accidentally overslept a bit.
My head is still hurting...

optionText.cn: 没想到重逢来得如此之快。
optionText.en: Didn't expect the reunion to come so quickly.

optionText.cn: 下次见面，我不会放过她。
optionText.en: She won't be getting away this time.

optionText.cn: 我会阻止事态恶化下去。
optionText.en: I won't let this situation get any worse.
We'll definitely solve this problem as well.
Let's talk about M3.

optionText.cn: 我需要更多武陵城的情报。
optionText.en: I need more intel about Wuling City.
Next stop: Wuling. Right?

optionText.cn: 下次别再勉强自己了，你对我们很重要。
为了帮我取回石棺，你这一路上辛苦了。
放心，我们马上会再见的。
抱歉，这部分也想不起来。
我真切地希望我还记得。
不用抱歉，这不是你的错。
没关系，至少我现在状态还不错。
谢谢你记得我说过什么……

optionText.en: You know each other?
You know this ... bandit?
Nod
Shake head
Qingbo Stockade?
Supreme chief?
Dragged her out?
What happened?
Are you calling someone?
What are you thinking about?
Nervous about heading home?
Let's go.
Give me some time to prepare.
What is a "Blight Tide"?

optionText.cn: 庄方宜是一个什么样的人？
optionText.en: What type of person is Zhuang Fangyi?

optionText.cn: 不常听你说起在武陵时的事。
optionText.en: I hardly heard you talk about Wuling.
I've got nothing to ask.
You seem pretty relaxed.
You look quite excited.

optionText.cn: 这附近也没有其他渡口……
optionText.en: There are no other ferry points nearby...
He seems like a friendly guy...
What is it?
Is there something you want to see?
How about a background check?
Found any clues?
There's no other way...
We can only push forward.
Sure. Tag along.
Well, we can't just leave you in the grove alone...
What is it?
How did you...?
We'll handle the enemy.
...Still nothing.

optionText.cn: 这附近只有天使的痕迹。
optionText.en: I only saw traces of Aggeloi around here.

optionText.cn: 我们一路都没有发现裂地者的踪影。
optionText.en: We didn't see any Landbreakers on our way here.

optionText.cn: 聂菲斯可不是这种低调的性格。
optionText.en: Nefarith has never been the low-key type.
Are you alright?

optionText.cn: 这些东西不像是武陵城搞得出来的。
optionText.en: These don't look like their work.

optionText.cn: 我们不久前投奔了清波寨。
optionText.en: We recently joined Qingbo Stockade.
Name's Darkmask, I'm new.
Glad nothing serious happened.

optionText.cn: 要不给我封个“天王”什么的？
optionText.en: How about a new title for me, something like Heavenly Majesty?
We're here to help you.
Our mission is to help everyone.

optionText.cn: 这个叫汤汤的有点难缠。
optionText.en: This Tangtang seems like a pain in the neck.

optionText.cn: 得想办法摆脱那个“大当家”。
optionText.en: We need to find a way to slip away from that "Chief".

optionText.cn: 目前找到佩丽卡才是最重要的。
optionText.en: Finding Perlica is our top priority for now.
Maybe we just force our way through...
What is it?
Have you seen Perlica?

optionText.cn: 还有，刚才她说你是被赶走……
optionText.en: She said you were dragged out by your tail...
Don't mention it. She's my chief, after all!
I, Darkmask, won't let you down.

optionText.cn: 那些裂地者，也就是怪人……
optionText.en: About those Landbreakers, aka the freaks...

optionText.cn: 那些天使，也就是“水花子”的袭击……
optionText.en: About the Aggeloi, aka the splatters that attacked you...

optionText.cn: 所以大当家！收下我们，共谋大事吧！
optionText.en: Please, take us under your wing, and let's accomplish something huge!
Wise choice, Chief!
Perlica, are you hurt?
I was really worried about you.
Uh, that's a long story.
Haha, yeah.

optionText.cn: 佩丽卡，你有什么想法吗？
optionText.en: Perlica, any thoughts?

optionText.cn: 看来，“清波豪杰”还得继续当下去了。
optionText.en: Guess we have to continue playing "Qingbo Heroes".

optionText.cn: “源石匠”会不会比“黑面煞”帅一点？
optionText.en: Does "Origortisan" sound better than "Darkmask"?
Chief, what's your call?
At your command!

optionText.cn: 大当家，带我们回寨子吧！
optionText.en: Chief, please take us to the Stockade!
I need more time to think...
You wrote this?
"Tangtang Cert"?

optionText.cn: 一鼓作气再而衰三而竭，这会儿可不能怂啊。
optionText.en: Can't waste the momentum. Time to drive it home.

optionText.cn: 我们在城内安排了内应，机不可失，就得今天。
optionText.en: I got my crew in town. Gotta pull it off today.

optionText.cn: 寨里豪杰云聚，没成绩我怎么坐得稳第三把交椅？
optionText.en: Third Seat in the Fam? I better do something mighty heroic.

optionText.cn: 其实今天是陈千语生日，我想替她出了这口恶气。
optionText.en: We're celebrating Chen's birthday, so we gotta get even for her.
I am.
I guess I can't be Darkmask anymore...
Mi Fu and Tangtang know each other?
Who's Mi Fu's superior?

optionText.cn: 了解，去弭弗那边看看吧。
optionText.en: Understood. Let's check up on Mi Fu.
Did Endfield design this?
Leave that to me.

optionText.cn: 也许我的源石技艺有用？
optionText.en: Perhaps my Originium Arts might work?
As much as we need!

optionText.cn: 苦苦支撑不是我们的目标。
optionText.en: Merely hanging on by a thread isn't enough.
We need to resolve this problem once and for all.
How long can Wuling last?
How long can we last?

optionText.cn: 那就是想看还是能看到！
optionText.en: That means if you want to see it, you can!
Any other uses for it?
Let's give it a try and find out!
Have some faith in Endfield Industries.
Hmm?
This feels ... familiar.
How considerate.
Thank you very much.
Much more at ease?
Much more reassured?
The past?

optionText.cn: 请别这么叫，我们只是顺手帮忙。
optionText.en: Please don't call us that. We just happened to lend a hand.
It's no big deal, really.

optionText.cn: 抱歉……我们得先去见庄天师。
optionText.en: Sorry... We have to meet Tianshi Zhuang first.
Who is she...?
I think she just looked at me...
She just smiled...

optionText.cn: 可以直接带我们飞过去吗？
optionText.en: Can you just fly us over there?
Maybe ... you could give us a ride.

optionText.cn: 我能在帝江号也放一个吗？
optionText.en: Can I put one of these on Dijiang?

optionText.cn: 这种龙泡泡，之后我能带一个走吗？
optionText.en: Can I take one with me later?
You can try shouting toward the city.
You can let out whatever's on your mind.
What is this?

optionText.cn: 你觉得她是个什么样的人？
optionText.en: What do you think she's like?
So, Tangtang...
So, Zhuang Fangyi...
I don't have anymore questions.
Don't worry about it, Tianshi Zhuang...
With crisis looming, no time for trivialities.
Do we know each other...?
But?
Did we have other encounters?
I've seen Nefarith.
We met her in the bamboo grove.
We can fill the canal...
Sounds like factory work...

optionText.cn: 为什么要在侵蚀如此活跃的区域建立城市？
optionText.en: Why build a city in a region with such high Blight activities?

optionText.cn: 刚才好像闻到一股很香的味道……
optionText.en: I caught a whiff of something delicious...

optionText.cn: 那个……我还想在合作计划中加入龙泡泡。
optionText.en: I'd like to include Chubby Lung in the cooperation plan...

optionText.cn: 你知道选剑局在哪儿吗？连天师说要给我好东西。
optionText.en: Tianshi Lian at the Bureau of Swordmancers has goodies for me.
Nope. I'm good.

optionText.cn: 弭队长和庄天师的关系很亲近吗？
optionText.en: Captain Mi, are you close to Tianshi Zhuang?

optionText.cn: 弭队长很信任庄天师嘛。
optionText.en: Looks like you trust her a lot.
Everyone?
Huh...
Authorize deployment.
By my authority, let the PAC fall!

optionText.cn: 嗯，是从帝江号上下来的。
optionText.en: It's dropped from Dijiang.

optionText.cn: 我们不止三个人，还有帝江号做外援。
optionText.en: It's more than just the three of us. We've got Dijiang up there.
I know.

optionText.cn: 用集成工业系统生产息壤，迫在眉睫。
optionText.en: Using the AIC Factory to produce Xiranite is urgent.

optionText.cn: 多谢了，武陵第一抄近道高手。
optionText.en: Thanks. Wuling's top shortcut king!

optionText.cn: 见习巡卫先生，干得不错。
optionText.en: Appreciate it, Mr. Trainee Watchguard!
You can come and visit any time.
Hongshan Swordmancers?

optionText.cn: 我还记得有人欠我装备。
optionText.en: Right, I remember someone owes me gear.
Have you already planned this...?
Can we still fix this?
It's not looking very well.
The chase helped me vent off some steam.
I actually had plenty of fun!
A friendly city.
A prosperous city.
A gentle city.
So, people kept talking about a performance.

optionText.cn: 一路上都有人在念叨“活动”……
optionText.en: I keep hearing about this "event"...
About that question of yours...
I do have something to say about Wuling...
We still have time to talk.

optionText.cn: 反正是忙里偷闲，现在正好。
optionText.en: This seems like a great time for stories.
Your past.
Wuling's past.
What was that self-reflection?

optionText.cn: 没想到一路过来会经历这么多……
optionText.en: This turned out to be a rather eventful trip...
We've walked for a while...
Here I am.

optionText.cn: 抱歉……我还是想不起来武陵的事。
optionText.en: But sorry... I can't remember much about Wuling.

optionText.cn: 我似乎错过了太多事情……
optionText.en: I seem to have missed out on many things...
Sure, let's go.

optionText.cn: 稍等，我还想再看看这间实验室。
optionText.en: Hold on. I want a closer look at this lab.
Maybe we should give it a love tap.
We should open the hood for an inspection.
Let's try driving it around.
I don't think we can do anything about this.
Let me guess. Results are good?
So I guess you succeeded.
No waiting by the side?

optionText.cn: 应该还有要确认的事项……
optionText.en: Maybe there are other things to verify...
You seem in need of a break.
You should look after yourself.
Should be?
Many things have happened since then...

optionText.cn: ……现在的我看再多，也很难得到答案。
optionText.en: I'm afraid the answers aren't really here.
That's a very vague question!
I can't really answer that.
It's good.
Of course!
It's alright, I guess.

optionText.cn: 感觉至少当年我很喜欢这里。
optionText.en: Well, me from the past probably did.

optionText.cn: 你还在担心终末地不会倾力相助？
optionText.en: Still worried about Endfield's commitment?

optionText.cn: 我们会尽全力保护武陵城。
optionText.en: We'll do what we can to protect Wuling City.

optionText.cn: 正好该去寻找那个答案了。
optionText.en: Time to seek the answer.

optionText.cn: 至少我们想要的答案是一样的。
optionText.en: At least we're both seeking the same answers.

optionText.cn: 一起去集成核心区域吗？
optionText.en: Join us at the Core AIC Area?
I hope I can stay for a while.
I can help.

optionText.cn: 这种小事就不劳庄天师了吧。
optionText.en: Let's not have Tianshi Zhuang run the errands.

optionText.cn: 我这台射流无人机效率高得很。
optionText.en: Wanna try my jet drone? It's super effective.
Sure.
A pleasing fragrance.
A unique scent.
Is it out of control?
Is it out of power?
We must chase it down!
It's alright...
Is this sky pole really that important?

optionText.cn: 能让你紧张的活动？有点好奇。
optionText.en: This event is making you nervous. I'm curious.
You're going nowhere!
Where are you going, little pole?

optionText.cn: 这位客人的开销算终末地头上……
optionText.en: Put this unfortunate diner's tab on Endfield...
Sorry for causing trouble...

optionText.cn: 就让她看看吧，她念叨你一路了。
optionText.en: FYI, she has been incredibly worried about you.

optionText.cn: 大当家，我们寨子那一千斤的粮食……
optionText.en: Chief, we need that kilo-catty of food...

optionText.cn: 她应该只是担心寨子……交给我处理吧。
optionText.en: It's about her Stockade. Let me talk to her.
Of course. You're my Supreme Chief!
I never sided with anyone else.

optionText.cn: 寨子的情况还是没有好转？
optionText.en: Is the Stockade still in trouble?
You mean our AIC Factory? Very calculating.

optionText.cn: 我们肯定帮你。等你的好消息。
optionText.en: We'll help you, and shall wait for your good news.

optionText.cn: 终末地和清波寨可是结过绺子的！
optionText.en: Qingbo and Endfield are two Fams united.
Qingbo Stockade will be the first to be hit.
We best hurry!

optionText.cn: 从最意想不到的地方发动进攻。
optionText.en: They'll strike at the most unexpected of places.
They might attempt to capture ... Qingbo Stockade.
Think Nefarith is behind this?
Maybe it's that Ardashir...
Thinking about something, Captain Mi?

optionText.cn: 该回去告诉庄天师了吧！
optionText.en: Time to report to Tianshi Zhuang.
Need help with that wound?
I got no more questions.
I'm ready for this.
Certainly. Hope this can help.
Where's Lifeng?
Where's Mr. Watchguard?
What's on your mind, Chief?

optionText.cn: 担心寨子遇上同样的情况？
optionText.en: Worried about the Tide hitting the Stockade?

optionText.cn: 怎么不走，不怕弭弗变卦？
optionText.en: Still here? Mi Fu might change her mind, you know.
I got no more questions.
Supreme Chief? How did you get arrested?
Did you expand your business here?

optionText.cn: 我单挑输了，愿赌服输，没辙啊大当家。
optionText.en: Can't do much, Chief. Lost the duel fair and square.

optionText.cn: 我有把柄落在他们手上，大当家莫要怪我。
optionText.en: They blackmailed me, Chief. I'm really sorry.

optionText.cn: 我们已经大仇得报，还在武陵城领了另一份工。
optionText.en: We avenged ourselves. I also got a job at Wuling.
Thank you, Chief.
Window wiping?
Supreme Chief, you actually do that...?
I squished ten, Captain Mi.

optionText.cn: 在下黑面煞，献十个天使给大当家。
optionText.en: Darkmask got ten dead splatters for the Chief.

optionText.cn: 但侵蚀是没有意志的。有人在背后操纵？
optionText.en: The Blight has no will. Someone's controlling it.
Can it be Nefarith?

optionText.cn: 大当家，你是怕输，还是更怕她出事？
optionText.en: Chief, you wanna win, or are you just worried?

optionText.cn: 大当家，你是怕她出事，还是更怕输？
optionText.en: Chief, you worried, or are you out to win?
You're using this bridge?
The Chief has spoken...
Let's focus on the real job.

optionText.cn: 先让大伙看看我们的集成工业系统吧！
optionText.en: Let's show the Fam our AIC Factory!
It's me! Darkmask!
How's it going, my good Fam!
Oh?
Let the Fam handle themselves?
What about you?
I'll keep that in mind!
Are you Vera?

optionText.cn: 诺夫曼让我来看看，你可以叫我管理员。
optionText.en: The Endmin. Noffman asked me to talk to you.
Seeds?

optionText.cn: 刚才你说<@qu.key>苦叶椒</>？我可以去采一些。
optionText.en: You mentioned <@qu.key>Tartpeppers</>. I can gather some.
Leave that to me.
Are you Wellmorin?
Hi. Do you have <@qu.key>seeds</> to sell?
I heard you're a botanist.

optionText.cn: 收东西？你在找什么东西吗？
optionText.en: From me? No. But are you looking for something?
Me? No. Don't mind me.
Very big words...

optionText.cn: 你从裂地者手上偷种子？
optionText.en: You steal seeds from LBs?
Hi. Do you have seeds to sell?
Don't let me waste your time. I'm just passing by.
Sure!

optionText.cn: 可惜种植机种不了苦叶椒……
optionText.en: The planting unit can't plant Tartpeppers...

optionText.cn: 但维尔莫林要价太贵了……
optionText.en: Wellmorin's things are overpriced...

optionText.cn: 好的，我需要的时候会来找你的。
optionText.en: Got it. I'll come visit when I got something to grow.

optionText.cn: 集成工业系统里有<@qu.key>采种机</>。
optionText.en: Our AIC Factory has <@qu.key>seed-picking units</> to do just that.

optionText.cn: 只要采集了植物，就可以用<@qu.key>采种机</>采集它的种子。
optionText.en: <@qu.key>Seed-picking units</> can extract seeds from plants we gathered.
Botanist? Where is he?
You must be Tian Min.

optionText.cn: 嗯，和我说说具体的情况吧。
optionText.en: You're right. Fill me in.

optionText.cn: 所以你是想让我帮忙种植作物？
optionText.en: So you want me to help with the crops?
Botanist?
Understood. Leave it to me.
Wellmorin?
We meet again.

optionText.cn: 对，你手上有金石稻的种子吗？
optionText.en: Yeah. You got any Amber Rice seeds?
That makes sense.
You seem quite familiar.

optionText.cn: 嗯，想看看你这里有哪些种子。
optionText.en: Let's see what seeds you have in stock.

optionText.cn: 不，想问问驮兽粪便的事……
optionText.en: I actually wanted to ask about the Burdo-Muck...
Not much. Just passing by.
Yeah, I'm all done.

optionText.cn: 之前有过一些种植的经验。
optionText.en: I've had some prior experience with cultivation.

optionText.cn: 或许可以靠我们研发的<@qu.key>洒水机</>。
optionText.en: Perhaps we could try our <@qu.key>Sprinkler</> out.
This isn't cheating, right?

optionText.cn: 我觉得这和“比身手”没关系……
optionText.en: Trial of agility? More like trial of cheating...
Let me verify the figures.
I'm good for now. Thanks.
What's going on here?

optionText.cn: 天师肯来，难道不算好事吗？
optionText.en: Having a Tianshi here is good news, right?

optionText.cn: 洪波天师，这是庄天师授意的吧？
optionText.en: Hong, have you been authorized by Tianshi Zhuang?

optionText.cn: 大当家说过的，这也不算数了？
optionText.en: Thought your Supreme Chief gave her word.
Have we reached a consensus?
Three Super Dares?
Indeed. Bring them on.

optionText.cn: 只要碰到河佬就行，对吧？
optionText.en: Just touch He Lao, right?
Piece of cake.
I can do that.
It'll only give him a better excuse.
Not yet. We should keep our words.

optionText.cn: 见招拆招，正面解决“第三难”吧。
optionText.en: Bring it on. We'll beat the Third Dare.

optionText.cn: 就算是他，现在也硬气不起来嘛。
optionText.en: Oopsy-daisy. Big angry man is getting busted.
He's getting owned? Am I seeing things?
Leave that to me.
Kite? What kite?

optionText.cn: 我能理解你对武陵城的看法。
optionText.en: I understand your feelings about Wuling.

optionText.cn: 如果实在不放心，就来一起试试吧。
optionText.en: I'll take the trial if that makes him feel better.
Wanna give this a shot?
Things are always toughest in the beginning.

optionText.cn: 指不定哪天“第三难”就来了。
optionText.en: The Third Dare shall descend any day.
Let us begin.
I need to warm up first.
Well, you never said we only get one go.
Let me prepare some more!
What's "that thing"?
Don't keep me in the dark...
Thank you, Xiaowu!
Wait, did you know we were coming?
Okay, let's try it out now.

optionText.cn: 确实听到有人叫了一声“小陈”。
optionText.en: I did hear someone say your name.

optionText.cn: 可能是我们赶去找庄天师处理公务时太匆忙了。
optionText.en: It was probably because we were in such a hurry to meet Tianshi Zhuang for official duties.
What's "that thing"?
Don't keep me in the dark...
Thank you, Xiaowu!
Wait, did you know we were coming?
Okay, let's try it out now.

optionText.cn: 不是每次都能一下完成精锻强化？
optionText.en: Artificing doesn't work every time?

optionText.cn: 那要是没有完成精锻强化会怎样？
optionText.en: What happens when an artificing attempt fails?
Huh?
What project?
Yes, I want to perform gear artificing.
Just passing by.

optionText.cn: 这正是我们现在需要的。
optionText.en: Exactly what we need.

optionText.cn: 感觉就像在重新认识一位老朋友。
optionText.en: Feels like meeting an old friend again.
Okay. I'll head right over.

optionText.cn: 总之，先建造一个新舱室试试吧。
optionText.en: Let's start by constructing a new cabin.

optionText.cn: 似乎比我想象中要容易一些。
optionText.en: Seems easier than I thought.

optionText.cn: 没想到进展会这么顺利。
optionText.en: Wow. That went pretty smooth.

optionText.cn: 看来需要关注的事项越来越多了。
optionText.en: The number of tasks we need to follow seem to be increasing.
Leave this to me.
We'll continue to rely on your assistance...
Are you alright?
The depot node...?
Leave it to me!
What happened?
Where's our bot?
I can take it from here.
Endfield Express, where duty meets delivery!
...Where's our operator?

optionText.cn: 看来这个岗位很需要亲近感。
optionText.en: Looks like this role really calls for a personal touch.

optionText.cn: 我有点想象不出你工作的样子……
optionText.en: I'm having a hard time picturing how you work...
So, is there anything I can do?
We shall return to the topic at hand.

optionText.cn: 听起来……其实就是使用<image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>调度券的商店？
optionText.en: So ... it's basically a shop that uses <image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>stock bills?

optionText.cn: 我授权启用物资调度系统。
optionText.en: Authorization granted to activate the stock redistribution system.
I need a bit more time.

optionText.cn: 我们用<image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>调度券代替了折金票？
optionText.en: We're using <image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>stock bills instead of T-Creds now?
Almost alarmingly convenient.
Okay... Understood.

optionText.cn: 你说过，它还能做更多的事？
optionText.en: You mentioned it can do more?

optionText.cn: 授权启用物资调度系统
optionText.en: Grant authorization to activate the stock redistribution system.
I'm all good for now.

optionText.cn: 授权启用物资调度系统
optionText.en: Grant authorization to activate the stock redistribution system.
I'm all good for now.
OK. Let's do some stock redistribution.
I'm all good for now.
Upgrade
You need more <image="WalletIcon/item_domain_tundra_coupon" scale=2>stock bills?

optionText.cn: 不会要我干什么坏事吧……？
optionText.en: You're not asking me to do anything shady, are you?
I can do that.
And ... we profit from it?

optionText.cn: 原来你真的是这方面的专家……
optionText.en: So you really are an expert in this field...
Keep up the good work. I'll rely on your oversight.
Sure. Thank you.
Not right now. Thanks.
Things look pretty bad.

optionText.cn: 他们处理不了这么多伤员。
optionText.en: The locals can't take care of all the wounded.
Why are you getting so many people?
I brought the supplies.
This is the last we have.
Dewey?

optionText.cn: 荞愈胶囊也不是万灵药。
optionText.en: Buck Capsule [C] isn't a panacea either.

optionText.cn: 我们需要更灵活的方案。
optionText.en: We need a more flexible solution.
That doesn't sound like a safe place...
I have a bad feeling about this.
Who's this dude?
Are you here to look for the injured?
We'll figure out something as well.
Every life is important.

optionText.cn: 我们能帮你做些什么吗？
optionText.en: Anything we could help you with?
You are a truly respectable man.
Then we'll be counting on you.
Experience gives rise to knowledge.

optionText.cn: 大家都有过困难的时候。
optionText.en: Everyone endured their share of difficult times.
My eyes have been opened.

optionText.cn: 这里难免情况复杂，辛苦了。
optionText.en: Your work is tough. The situation here is rather complicated.
Please calm down.
Sounds really dangerous.
We're heading out with you.
Of course we are.
Yeah, of course. We won't say no.
I don't see any external wounds.
We came just in time.
Dewey?
But we fought the battle.
You're too rash, Dewey.
Don't be so hard on yourself.
No one should be treated like that.

optionText.cn: 没想到还有这样的故事。
optionText.en: I didn't expect a story like this.

optionText.cn: 难怪阿杜这么想把工人们救出来。
optionText.en: So that's why Dewey wanted to save the crew mates so much.
Here's your chance, Dewey.
You'll say yes, right?
Leave it to me.
Sure. Tell me about the problem.
I hope I didn't miss anything.
How do you want to offer your thanks?
I've never seen you taking a break.
You seem to like cooking a lot, Mr. Roman.
Sounds like a tough trade to be in.
They say bakers are really tough.
Sore shoulders, I suppose.

optionText.cn: 也许我该同情你的腰了。
optionText.en: Maybe I should sympathize with your hips.
Some soothing herbs might work...
Ah, did I say something? I don't think I did...
Thanks a million.
You just earned yourself a gold star.
Yeah. I need to speak with him.

optionText.cn: 你知道安德烈喜欢什么吗？
optionText.en: Do you know what Andre likes?

optionText.cn: 工程技术以外的方面呢？
optionText.en: Anything else besides engineering and tech?
Because he's an old friend of mine.
The Endmin's gotta care for the Endfielders, right?
I can't offer "myself" as a gift...

optionText.cn: 他最近有什么想要的东西吗？
optionText.en: Well, is there anything else that Andre might want?
I got my hands on the intel.

optionText.cn: 这一定会是一份好礼物。
optionText.en: Sounds like awesome gifts already.

optionText.cn: 他们会明白你们的心意的。
optionText.en: They will appreciate your kindness.
Leave it to me!
Everything seems to be working out.
Is this for me?
Thank you. It's a beautiful picture.
Definitely the best way to go about it.

optionText.cn: 将来能把技术用在正道上了。
optionText.en: He's putting his basics in the right place.

optionText.cn: 阿杜对这份工作很上心。
optionText.en: Dewey seems really interested in this job.
What are you and Ginny planning?
Karja...
That may be true, but...
This is the power of unity.
I feel happy for you, Karja.
...And thus we took another step forward.
A new beginning has dawned upon this place.
We're alright.
Meh. We dealt more hurt to the enemies.
It's still pretty dangerous outside.
Don't push yourself too hard.
But our resources are limited.
Maybe we can "change" our defenses on the fly.

optionText.cn: 关键在于如何应对变化。
optionText.en: The key is to change with the situation.
Let's get things rolling.
Just do your best.
You're already doing a pretty good job.

optionText.cn: 这样暂居处就暂时安全了。
optionText.en: Well, this camp is safe for now.
Have faith in Endfield hardware.

optionText.cn: 这次升级会带来哪些改变？
optionText.en: What will this upgrade do?
Let's start. What should I do?

optionText.cn: 我们可以用培养舱做什么？
optionText.en: What can we do with the Growth Chamber?

optionText.cn: 听起来像是要在帝江号上种东西。
optionText.en: Does that mean we can farm on Dijiang?

optionText.cn: 我对最后这点很感兴趣。
optionText.en: Steady supply? I like the sound of that.

optionText.cn: 那就让我们赶快开工吧。
optionText.en: Then let's get started immediately.

optionText.cn: 真想马上看到培养成果。
optionText.en: Looking forward to the harvest.

optionText.cn: 它确实能缓解我们的燃眉之急。
optionText.en: It can really grow some rare stuff we need.

optionText.cn: 接下来还会解锁更多新舱室吗？
optionText.en: Do we have more cabins to unlock?
Ardelia?
Why are you here?
Same here.
Six years? That sounds really fast.
Six years? That sounds pretty long to me.
Geological probe?
And that's exactly why we're here.
No trouble at all.

optionText.cn: 我还有其他事，等一下再来帮你们。
optionText.en: I'm busy now. Let me help you out later.
Yeah. Let's see how you're all doing.
Not really. I'll be back later.

optionText.cn: 你其实也很在意这些生物。
optionText.en: You also care about the critters.

optionText.cn: 你其实并不反对克莱维尔。
optionText.en: You're not actually against Clavell.
So you actually approve of Dean?

optionText.cn: 你们本质上想法是一样的。
optionText.en: Both of you are essentially alike.
The young people you're talking about......
I'm not really young......
Absolutely.

optionText.cn: 看您这打扮，做饭一定很好吃。
optionText.en: Your gear tells me you make awesome food.

optionText.cn: 您看起来不像是工团成员？怎么会在这里？
optionText.en: You don't look like a UWST crew mate. Why are you here?

optionText.cn: 这里的负责人叫<@qu.key>诺夫曼</>？他在哪里？
optionText.en: <@qu.key>Noffman</> is in charge of this place. Where is he?

optionText.cn: 他们最后出现的地方是哪里？
optionText.en: Where were they last seen?
Maybe we can help.
We're sorry. The trails suddenly went cold.

optionText.cn: 我们没能把他们带回来。
optionText.en: We couldn't bring them back.
How's the construction of the refuge point going?
Sorry about your three missing crew mates...

optionText.cn: 集成工业系统的供货情况如何？
optionText.en: Getting enough supplies from the AIC Factory?
Carry on. Don't let me take up your time.
Are you alright?
How goes your SAR operation?

optionText.cn: 我们捡到了一些……遗留物品。
optionText.en: We picked up a few ... things left behind.
Sounds like a plan.
I'll get it arranged.
But you seem to be troubled.
You look really tired.
Of course.
Feed me already.
What are you planning next?

optionText.cn: 附近还有裂地者活动，要小心。
optionText.en: Careful. Some Landbreakers still roam this place.

optionText.cn: 集成工业系统的供货情况如何？
optionText.en: Getting enough supplies from the AIC Factory?
Carry on. Don't let me take up your time.

optionText.cn: 你们打算搞什么大动作？
optionText.en: A major undertaking?

optionText.cn: 在瞭望塔上加装的设备是？
optionText.en: What hardware are you installing on the watch tower?

optionText.cn: 我看到了他的笔记，他正在制订拆卸方案。
optionText.en: I read his notes. He has a dismantling plan.
I'm a master of the Dismantling Mode.
Let's head over.
Leave it to the two of us.
I'm itching for muscle work.
Very impressive.
Beautifully done!
You alright?
How are your injuries looking?

optionText.cn: 其实是诺夫曼和大潘一起做的。
optionText.en: Actually, Noffman and Da Pan pulled it off.

optionText.cn: 你之前应该是工程师吧？
optionText.en: You used to be an engineer, right?

optionText.en: I don't see Noffman around. Where did he go?

optionText.cn: 集成工业系统的供货还顺利吗？
optionText.en: Is the AIC Factory giving you the supplies you need?

optionText.cn: 我只是路过，还有别的安排。
optionText.en: I'm just passing by. Got other jobs to handle.

What is it, Noffman?
Did something happen?
You did your best.
It wasn't your fault.

optionText.cn: 先恢复信号数据发给菲奥娜吧。
optionText.en: Let's get the signal data and give it to Fiona.

optionText.cn: 我们获得了很重要的信息！
optionText.en: We got some important news!

optionText.cn: 有件事，我们必须马上和你商量。
optionText.en: There's a thing we must discuss with you now.

optionText.cn: 掉队的三个人可能还活着。
optionText.en: Your three missing crew mates might be still alive.

optionText.cn: 我收到了掉队那三人的重要线索。
optionText.en: I found key intel about the three missing crew mates.

optionText.cn: 他们很可能是主动切断了自己的定位信号。
optionText.en: They might have severed their own signals a while ago.

optionText.cn: 可能是为了不拖累队伍，选择了留下。
optionText.en: Maybe they didn't want to slow down the crew, so they left.
Count me in.

optionText.cn: 我对《应急手册》的内容也颇为好奇。
optionText.en: I'm interested in your Emergency Manual.
What should I do?
Tell me how this works.
Have faith in everyone.
We will make it happen.
ONE!

optionText.cn: 最艰难的时候已经过去了。
optionText.en: The toughest times are now behind us.

optionText.cn: 这里现在好热闹，都有咖啡厅了？
optionText.en: It's getting boisterous. You even have a café!
Where is Da Pan?

optionText.cn: 集成工业系统的供货情况怎么样？
optionText.en: Getting enough supplies from the AIC Factory?

optionText.cn: 挺好，你接下来什么打算？
optionText.en: Sounds good. What are your plans?

optionText.cn: 看来在那之后，又发生了不少事。
optionText.en: I see. Plenty of things happened after that incident, right?
People are still trapped in that place?
Signals? What sort of signals?
I'll go take a look.
Is it somewhere up ahead?

optionText.cn: 怎么了？我能帮到你什么吗？
optionText.en: Is there something I can help you with?

optionText.cn: 我找到了一具尸体，在他身上发现了这个。
optionText.en: I found this from a dead body.

optionText.cn: 你的“恋人”不愿意见你，他让我把手表带给你。
optionText.en: He's not coming back and wants to return the watch.
I'm very sorry.

optionText.cn: 那里都是裂地者，他不该跑去那边的。
optionText.en: He went to an LB turf. It was a bad mistake.

optionText.cn: 那边很危险，我不建议你这么做。
optionText.en: I advise against it. It's a dangerous place.
He's well.
...Okay. Just look out for yourself.

optionText.cn: 你就是罗马诺吧？你的恋人正在到处找你……
optionText.en: Romano, right? Your lover is looking all over the place for you...

optionText.cn: 你确定吗？她好像很关心你。
optionText.en: You sure? She seems to care a lot for you.

optionText.cn: 你还好吗？我先送你到安全的地方吧。
optionText.en: You alright? Let's send you to somewhere safe.

optionText.cn: 那些源石虫？它们对你这么重要吗？
optionText.en: Are those Originium Slugs so important to you?

optionText.cn: 那些源石虫现在都跑去哪儿了？你有头绪吗？
optionText.en: Got any ideas where your slugs ran off to?

optionText.cn: 这种源石虫看起来跑得很快，要怎么抓？
optionText.en: These slugs are fast. How do we catch them?

optionText.cn: 交给我吧，你在这里等我，不要乱跑。
optionText.en: Leave it to me. Stay here and don't run around.

optionText.cn: 抓到了，它跑得还挺快的。
optionText.en: Nabbed one. Little bugger can really move.
Terran ancestors? So they...
Yeah. I caught more of them.

optionText.cn: 其他源石虫可能逃去哪里？
optionText.en: Where can we find more slugs?

optionText.cn: 你之前提到一个叫安东尼的人……
optionText.en: You mentioned someone named Anthony...
No slugs left behind, I hope.
We caught them all, right?

optionText.cn: 你为什么要研究源石虫？
optionText.en: Why study these Originium Slugs?

optionText.cn: 我抓它们的时候，经常会闻到一股奇怪的味道……
optionText.en: I caught a strange odor when chasing the slugs...
He probably evacuated.

optionText.cn: 我之前遇见过一个叫安东尼的人……
optionText.en: I actually met someone named Anthony...

optionText.cn: 他被侵蚀困住了一阵儿，精神状态受到了影响。
optionText.en: The Blight trapped him in a cave and messed with his mind.

optionText.cn: 看来你得自己照顾这些源石虫了。
optionText.en: You're the only slug-keeper left, Oleg.
Are you the one in charge?

optionText.cn: 裂地者被其他人干掉了？
optionText.en: Landbreakers taken out by someone else?
Someone's helping us?

optionText.cn: 确实让人在意，一起调查吧。
optionText.en: Definitely worth looking into. Let's investigate together.
This close to the base...
Can't shake this uneasy feeling.

optionText.cn: 先看看这里能收集到什么线索吧。
optionText.en: Let's see what clues we can gather here first.
He looks incredibly strong though.
How could you tell?

optionText.cn: 袭击者的实力不一般啊……
optionText.en: The attacker's skills are seriously extraordinary...
A sudden ambush took place here.

optionText.cn: 裂地者们似乎想要联系什么人。
optionText.en: The Landbreakers seemed to be trying to contact someone.

optionText.cn: 袭击者阻止了他们的计划。
optionText.en: The attacker thwarted their plan.

optionText.cn: 不论如何，是个手段干脆的杀手。
optionText.en: Regardless, they're a ruthlessly efficient killer.

optionText.cn: 杀掉他们的人和裂地者一样危险。
optionText.en: They're as dangerous as the Landbreakers themselves.
You should be careful too.

optionText.cn: 敌人的敌人不一定就是朋友。
optionText.en: The enemy of my enemy isn't necessarily a friend.
A sudden ambush took place here.

optionText.cn: 裂地者们似乎想要联系什么人。

optionText.en: Regardless, they're a ruthlessly efficient killer.

optionText.cn: 杀掉他们的人和裂地者一样危险。
optionText.en: They're as dangerous as the Landbreakers themselves.

optionText.cn: 你是负责这里的干员吗？
optionText.en: Are you the operator in charge?
Who? Landbreakers?

optionText.cn: 我第一次在采石场看到裂地者。
optionText.en: It's my first time seeing Landbreakers at the Quarry.
What are they doing here?
Let's start with the scene investigation.

optionText.cn: 我第一次在采石场看到裂地者。
optionText.en: It's my first time seeing Landbreakers at the Quarry.
Another attack site?
...Do you smell something burning?
You know him?
Is he famous?

optionText.cn: 听起来不像是能轻易做到的。
optionText.en: Doesn't sound like an easy thing to pull off.
Could also be they were specifically targeted.

optionText.cn: 这里发生了一场有预谋的伏击。
optionText.en: This was a premeditated ambush.
"Will-o-Wisp" was heavily targeted.

optionText.cn: 他们来采石场似乎另有所图。
optionText.en: They seemed to have another purpose for coming to the quarry.
We need more intel.

optionText.cn: 这里发生了一场有预谋的伏击。
optionText.en: This was a premeditated ambush.
"Will-o-Wisp" was heavily targeted.

optionText.cn: 他们来采石场似乎另有所图。
optionText.en: They seemed to have another purpose for coming to the quarry.

optionText.cn: 也许是总结分析的时候了。
optionText.en: Maybe it's time to analyze what we've got.
What's going on?
This place is dangerous, don't get too close.

optionText.cn: 裂地者占领了蚀崖监测站？
optionText.en: Landbreakers took over the Blight Cliff monitoring station?

optionText.cn: 这地方连桥都是刚刚修好的……
optionText.en: This place even had its bridge recently repaired...
Can't even see the full picture from here.
Let me help out.
You planning to go inside?
Another incident here too?

optionText.cn: 这地方连桥都是刚刚修好的……
optionText.en: This place even had its bridge recently repaired...
Can't even see the full picture from here.
I'll figure out how to handle the Blight.
Why?

optionText.cn: 这些裂地者似乎有点古怪……
optionText.en: These Landbreakers seem a bit off...

optionText.cn: 不像是战斗造成的死亡。
optionText.en: Doesn't look like combat fatalities.

optionText.cn: 也许还有我们不知道的情况。
optionText.en: Maybe there are factors we're not aware of.

Examine fatal wound
Search belongings
Finish investigating

optionText.cn: 你认不认得他们的项链？
optionText.en: Do you recognize their necklaces?

optionText.cn: 他们在内部斗争中失利了？
optionText.en: Did they lose in an internal struggle?

optionText.cn: 听起来，聂菲斯没有太重用他们。
optionText.en: Sounds like Nefarith didn't value them too highly.
I've had similar suspicions.

optionText.cn: 不是所有人都能使用那样的弩。
optionText.en: Not everyone can handle a crossbow like that.

optionText.cn: 你认不认得他们的项链？
optionText.en: Do you recognize their necklaces?

What a messy scene.

We'll figure something out together.
Count me in.
Careful, the area's hazardous.

optionText.cn: 这确实不像一般人能做到的。
optionText.en: This definitely isn't something an average person could pull off.

optionText.cn: 说不定是碾骨氏族内讧了。
optionText.en: Could be internal strife within the Bonekrusher Clan.
Let's find a way to get closer for evidence collection.
Need to be that surprised?
That famous, huh?

optionText.cn: 听起来像是又一个罗丹。
optionText.en: He just sounds like Rhodagn number two.

optionText.cn: 你觉得这里发生了什么？
optionText.en: What do you think happened here?
"Volcano" clearly had a plan.
"Shadow".
Nefarith. She is the leader after all.
It's too early to jump to conclusions.

optionText.cn: 一定发生了激烈的战斗。
optionText.en: Must've been a fierce fight.

optionText.cn: 也许是被当作诱饵用了？
optionText.en: Maybe it was used as bait?
