optionText.en: Sign the deal with Erikssohn as planned.

optionText.cn: 转为与克莱韦思环塔贸易公司接洽。
optionText.en: Sign the deal with Clavis TGCC Trading instead.

optionText.cn: 都不满意，开始新一轮竞价流程。
optionText.en: I don't like any of them. Restart the bidding.

optionText.cn: 秦主管，你还忙得过来吗？
optionText.en: How are you managing, Director Qin?
Anything I can do to help?

optionText.cn: 她是真的需要个助理来分担工作了。
optionText.en: She really needs an assistant to share her workload.
Does she have to stay on top of everything?

optionText.cn: 是时候替同事们分忧了。
optionText.en: Time to share my colleague's burden.

optionText.cn: 没关系，情况我大概有数。
optionText.en: It's alright. I have a good idea of the sitch.

optionText.cn: 我明白，你还有别的事情要忙，对吧？
optionText.en: I understand. You got other things to do, right?

optionText.cn: 不用了，我自己去附近看看。
optionText.en: It's alright. I can tour this place myself.

optionText.cn: 我代秦茳尺来确认情况。
optionText.en: I'm here to verify the sitch on behalf of Director Qin.

optionText.cn: 现在旧工厂区的情况怎么样？
optionText.en: How's the Old Factory doing right now?

optionText.cn: 我能修复一些源石设备。
optionText.en: I know how to repair some Originium facilities.
That's why I'm here.

optionText.cn: 我能关闭它，带我去控制终端吧。
optionText.en: I can shut it down. Take me to the control terminal.

optionText.cn: 最好有人留下接应医疗小组。
optionText.en: Someone should stay to meet the medical team.

optionText.cn: 莱科，她的状态好像不太好。
optionText.en: Lykor, I don't think she's doing too well.
What is it, Laeya?
No problem.
Sure. Let me handle the machine.
What does the manual say?
You can call me the Endministrator.

optionText.cn: 嗯，每个人都是这个反应。
optionText.en: Indeed, everyone reacted the same way.

optionText.cn: 这些话的重复度多少也有些高了……
optionText.en: By Talos! Everyone keeps saying the same thing...

optionText.cn: 先不说这个，莱雅，你现在感觉怎么样？
optionText.en: Anyway, Laeya, feeling better already?
Yeah, a veteran specialist. Practice makes perfect.
Joyful music
Emotional music
Retro music

optionText.cn: 就你做的工作来说，已经很好了。
optionText.en: You're actually doing your job pretty well.

optionText.cn: 你得试着再理解一下大家。
optionText.en: You can try putting yourself in their shoes.

optionText.cn: 对他们来说，现在还不到能够开心的时候。
optionText.en: They don't think this is the right time to be happy.

optionText.cn: 埃里克，人们不总是应该开心的。
optionText.en: Eric, people don't have to be happy all the time.
Everyone calls me the Endministrator.
That's right. What can I do here?
How's the sitch?

optionText.cn: 得先确认有哪些能做的事。
optionText.en: We must verify what our priority tasks are.
Knowing the actual situation is important.

optionText.cn: 我可以帮忙解决药品问题。
optionText.en: I can take care of the meds issue.

optionText.cn: 终末地能生产一些应急药物。
optionText.en: Endfield can produce some emergency meds.
Wilbur mentioned something about the freight lines.

optionText.cn: 也许物资散落在外面了？
optionText.en: Perhaps they've been scattered all over the place.

optionText.cn: 接下来就轮到延期的物资了。
optionText.en: Now we can focus on the delayed supplies.
Time to work on the next problem.

optionText.cn: 确实是运输过程中出了状况，东西到了就好。
optionText.en: There was an accident but we got it sorted out.
Leave this to me.

optionText.cn: 她之前是不是在一个聚落组织？
optionText.en: Didn't she live in a tribe or something?

optionText.cn: 她是那什么长地的“游人”？
optionText.en: She's a Songseeker of some Circuit, right?
Survival techniques?

optionText.cn: 也会教给终末地的人吗？
optionText.en: She teaches Endfielders as well?

optionText.cn: 我们动身吧，希望还来得及。
optionText.en: Let's go. Hope we can be fast enough.

optionText.cn: 卡贾，先照顾好自己，不要连你也陷入危险。
optionText.en: Take care of yourself, Karja. Stay out of trouble.

optionText.cn: 我们得赶紧找找更多线索。
optionText.en: We must find more clues.

optionText.cn: 这就是涂鸦的尽头了，弧光呢？
optionText.en: This is the last of the graffiti. Where's Arclight?

optionText.cn: 这里有机关，和门是相连的。
optionText.en: There's a mechanism here. It's connected to the door.

optionText.cn: 或许是源石电路的问题？
optionText.en: The problem might lie in the Originium circuitry.
Let me have a go.

optionText.cn: 这就是众生长地的风格吗？
optionText.en: So this is how the Hannabit Circuit communes with others.

optionText.cn: 有条有理，和所有人都妥当地交流。
optionText.en: Well thought out words that reach out to everyone.

optionText.cn: 无论事态如何发展，都按照“当下”来做判断。
optionText.en: Decisions based on the best options of the given moment.

optionText.cn: 平和对待所有人，也收获应有的尊重。
optionText.en: Fair treatment of everyone, and getting respected in return.

optionText.cn: 看来碾骨氏族里有人还不想放弃这里。
optionText.en: Some Bonekrushers are actually trying to stay.
No worries. We're checking that place out right now.
You have an important mission?

optionText.cn: 有什么我们可以帮忙的吗？
optionText.en: Is there anything we can help you with?
A man of terrifying initiative and action.

optionText.cn: 感觉这个瓦茨神神秘秘的。
optionText.en: This Waitz behaves in mysterious ways.

optionText.cn: 保险起见，一起去看看吧。
optionText.en: We should follow. Just to be on the safe side.
What's inside the crates?
Let's help out our friend.

optionText.cn: 还是把罐头也找回来吧。
optionText.en: Let's look for the missing tins.
What's behind this gate?
Thank you.
How's the situation here?
Saw anyone from the UWST?

optionText.cn: 看来只能先进去找个人问问了。
optionText.en: I guess we'll have to ask someone
Jump? Seems pretty far down.

optionText.cn: 呃，先看看有没有别的入口吧……
optionText.en: We ... should look for another way in...
Greetings. We're Endfielders from...

optionText.cn: 之前收到了从这里发出的求援讯号……
optionText.en: We received a distress call from this place...

optionText.cn: 是想先把断了的路“连”上吧？
optionText.en: So you need some road repairs?

optionText.cn: 那么问题的“关键”还是怎么才能连通道路？
optionText.en: So making the roads usable again will be key.
The super crane's lifting cage is still usable?

optionText.cn: 我明白了，我需要看一下起重机的供电中枢。
optionText.en: Got it. I'll take a look at the power nexus of the crane.
You're worried about her, right?
What's going on?
I probably can, but...

optionText.cn: 你们这个起重机是不是被专门改造过？
optionText.en: Have you modified this crane before?

optionText.cn: 有几个部分不是同类装置的构成方式。
optionText.en: There are parts taken from other machines.

optionText.cn: 我想看一下改造时用的图纸。
optionText.en: Can I take a look at the mod schematics?
Wow. Luck *is* turning around.
Where exactly is "there"?

optionText.cn: 你先说说看是什么事？或许我们能帮上忙。
optionText.en: Calm down and tell us about it. We can help.
I probably do.
Leave that to me.
Never wanted to leave?
Can I ask you something?

optionText.cn: 这里是不是快要被关闭了？
optionText.en: Is this place getting shut down?
I just guessed.

optionText.cn: 蛛丝马迹太多，况且你还说漏嘴了。
optionText.en: It's very obvious. You also gave us the slip.

optionText.cn: 失联的人都是去做收尾工作的？
optionText.en: And you couldn't contact those sent to do the closing jobs?
Let's go there first.
You know us?
I assume you know of a way.
Nope. Nothing.
Don't worry. Leave it to us.
No problem! Leave it to me.
I'll give it a shot, but I can't promise anything.

optionText.cn: 你不是深层管理区的人？
optionText.en: You're not part of the Deep Management Post crew.
Why are you here?
Did you find any?

optionText.cn: 是为了采石场不被关停？
optionText.en: You don't want the Aburrey Quarry to get shut down.
That's hard to say.
They ... miss each other, right?
Are they playing a game or something?
A true old boy...
I guess Penny never told them anything.
Things don't look fine to me.
Ah. This has ended pretty well, don't you agree?
How are you? Feeling better now?
Feeling better? Got it off your chest?

optionText.cn: 想知道你是怎么看待米菈的。
optionText.en: I wonder how you regard Mila.

optionText.cn: 想知道你是怎么看待菲莉丝的。
optionText.en: I wonder how you regard Phyllis.

optionText.cn: 她们对你来说，意味着什么？
optionText.en: What do you think about your apprentices?
Nothing.
Yes. This one is super sus.
Let me reconsider.
Yes. This one is super sus.
Let me reconsider.
Yes. This one is super sus.
Let me reconsider.
Yes. This one is super sus.
Let me reconsider.
We should bring her back.

optionText.cn: 柯林斯他们应该也有话要对她说。
optionText.en: The Collinses might want to talk to her.

optionText.cn: 四号谷地现在非常危险，你也不想丢掉性命吧？
optionText.en: Valley IV is dangerous. We're trying to protect you.

optionText.cn: 再有价值的新闻也要你活着才能够报道，不是吗？
optionText.en: Only the living can write informative news articles.

optionText.cn: 靠你了，我也再去问问佩丽卡那边有什么新情报。
optionText.en: Sure. I'll also ask Perlica if she learned anything new.

optionText.cn: 交给你了，我再想想别的办法。
optionText.en: Thanks. I'll think of something else as well.
Paparazza?

optionText.cn: 你说的意外状况难道是……
optionText.en: So that unexpected sitch you mentioned...

optionText.cn: 这状况听起来确实挺“意外”的……
optionText.en: That sounds rather "unexpected"...

optionText.cn: 所以，你们是想让我们终末地帮忙“抓住”她吗？
optionText.en: So, you want us to "arrest" her or something?
Got it. Any tips for me?

optionText.cn: 那关于记者的行踪，你们有什么头绪吗？
optionText.en: Got any ideas where this journalist might be?

optionText.cn: 她只告诉了我是位“合适的协助者”。
optionText.en: She only told me about a "suitable assistant".
Ah, it's you ... Avywenna.
...Thank you.

optionText.cn: 无论如何，这次要辛苦你了。
optionText.en: Well, we're really counting on you this time.
Patience. Let's just wait for a while.
What do you think of these witness reports?
That's a good point...
I agree.
Yeah. I think I know who it is.
I guess that's what happened...

optionText.cn: 除非她会飞，不然也只有这条路能走。
optionText.en: It's her only way out, unless she knows how to fly.
Find her ASAP?
Drop this assignment?
What a coincidence.
Can it be...

optionText.cn: 你看起来很有应付这种人的经验……
optionText.en: Had experience dealing with escape artists?
You handled that really well.

optionText.cn: 这脚印看着还挺熟悉的。
optionText.en: These footprints look pretty familiar.

optionText.cn: 莫非……又是我们的“老朋友”？
optionText.en: Probably some "old friends" of ours.
Perhaps?
You're spitting hard facts, Avy.
Returned to its rightful owner.
You're leaving already?
Why don't you stick around for more missions?

optionText.cn: 佩丽卡，药物的下落有什么线索吗？
optionText.en: Perlica, any leads on our missing medication?
I'll think of something, surgeon.
We'll deal with the medication issue.
It might help us find her...

optionText.cn: 看来她的能力确实不错。
optionText.en: Seems like someone capable of doing her job.
We now have a clue.

optionText.cn: 当务之急是先把药找到。
optionText.en: Our priority is to recover the missing medical supplies.

optionText.cn: 好的，继续关注求救信号。
optionText.en: Okay. Stay on this distress signal for us.
We should head over and take a look!
We're on it.
We'll head over there ASAP.
We still have time to head in and retrieve the supplies.
We'll go in right now and save her.
No questions from me.

optionText.cn: 万物终归下水道，宇宙尽头是管道。
optionText.en: The sewers are the end of the entire cosmos.
It's urgent. Dive in first. Ask questions later.
Don't worry. I'm alright.
I'm okay. We need to find the exit.

optionText.cn: 别这么嚣张，还有我们在呢。
optionText.en: Cease this nonsense, Landbreaker. You now answer to us.

optionText.cn: 佩丽卡，药还能回收多少。
optionText.en: Perlica, how much of the medicine can we salvage?

optionText.cn: 药物应该没有全部损坏，是否可以应急？
optionText.en: Not all is lost. Are there enough meds left?
Let's take these back quickly.
Great. Let's head back and talk to Yue.

optionText.cn: 现在只有这些，先给最紧急的伤员用上。
optionText.en: This is it. Let's treat the most critical patients.

optionText.cn: 我们尽力回收了一部分，先救急！
optionText.en: We recovered as much as we could. For the emergency!
Where's Molly right now?

optionText.cn: 重回基层岗位，感受如何？
optionText.en: How does it feel to be part of the crew again?

optionText.cn: 你的表情没你说的那么洒脱。
optionText.en: Your expression speaks otherwise.
You still look bothered.

optionText.cn: 我们都会经历这样的时刻。
optionText.en: We all went through similar moments.

optionText.cn: 在那样的情境下，我能理解你的选择。
optionText.en: I can understand your choice, given the situation back then.

optionText.cn: 没错，是我。莉莉卡，你身体好起来了吗？
optionText.en: That's right. Feeling better, Lilica?

optionText.cn: 她的心意是好的，但是用错了方法。
optionText.en: Her intentions were good, but her actions were wrong.

optionText.cn: 有时候做好事也是有代价的。
optionText.en: Doing the right thing might have its own costs.

optionText.cn: 能解决问题，又不带来别的麻烦。
optionText.en: Solve the problem without causing more trouble.

optionText.cn: 对有些人来说，行动本身就是报偿。
optionText.en: Some regard the right action as payment enough.
The drag marks on the shelf look pretty fresh.
He's not lying, Jenner.

optionText.cn: 大树一切都好，只是我需要对它做一些调整。
optionText.en: The Great Oak is alright, but I need to make a few changes to it.
Is there anything I can do to help?
Is she awake?
Submit the medical ingredients.
Hold it.
What's ... happening right now?
You know me?

optionText.cn: 你先休息一下？我暂时不会走。
optionText.en: You can rest. I'll be staying for a bit.

optionText.cn: 大树……我们等下再一起去看。
optionText.en: The Great Oak... We can look at it later.

optionText.cn: 她……还能把之前的事全想起来吗？
optionText.en: Then can she ... remember things from the past?
Also a chance it'll stay this way?
...The fact that the Great Originium Oak is no longer around.
If only I could remember...
We should start setting things up right now.

optionText.cn: 找詹娜的事交给我和阿丽娅。
optionText.en: Leave finding Jenner to Alia and me.
Someone must go and seal the roads.
I'm actually here for lunch as well.

optionText.cn: 等下，我想和你确认一点事。
optionText.en: Hold on. I got something to verify with you.
Yeah. She said she ate butter fowl every week.

optionText.cn: 我对黄油羽兽很感兴趣。
optionText.en: I'm interested in butter fowl.
You know how to make this dish?
Definitely. I'll look for some.
Please stay here, Alia.

optionText.cn: 那就算你一个，先一起回去吧。
optionText.en: Welcome aboard, my man. Let's head back together.
You seem to have immense respect for her.

optionText.cn: 看来你提前找到要做的事了？
optionText.en: I guess you found something you can help with.
Submit the canned tomatoes.
Just hold on a minute.
He remembered it wrong. He actually made this before.
How does it taste?
It's not spicy enough?
The spice mix is off?
Maybe there's a technical malfunction at the station.

optionText.cn: 打起精神，别把事情想到最坏。
optionText.en: Liven up a little. Stop thinking about the worst.

optionText.cn: 先找到她吧，然后再考虑其他事。
optionText.en: Let's find her first and think later.
Let's go to the <@qu.key>Cradle of the Ages</>.

optionText.cn: 我们还没找到她，别轻易放弃。
optionText.en: Don't give up. We haven't found her yet.
You...
I promise.
It's alright to cry...
She entrusted the symbol of "hope" into your hands.
Please, just answer our questions.
We have reasonable cause to suspect you.

optionText.cn: 尤莉娅的通信记录查得怎么样？
optionText.en: Found anything about Yulia's comm records?

optionText.cn: “做小生意的中间人”那边有动静吗？
optionText.en: Any updates about the go-between with a small business?

optionText.cn: 阿尔乔姆的问题恐怕更严重。
optionText.en: Artyom might be a bigger problem than we like to think.

optionText.cn: 在找到真相前，你是不会这么做的。
optionText.en: There will be no vengeance before we reveal the truth.
I believe in you.
Then please have faith in me.

optionText.cn: 我们一起查出真相。也是为了他们。
optionText.en: Let's reveal the truth. It's the only way to give them justice.
We're thinking the same thing.
Sounds like a plan.

optionText.cn: 我们也一起去，确保万无一失。
optionText.en: We'll tag along and improve our chances of success.

optionText.cn: 我们会潜伏在外侧，以防她设下反埋伏。
optionText.en: We'll hide in the vicinity, just in case she's set up an ambush.

optionText.cn: 那些裂地者，是来寻仇的。
optionText.en: Those Landbreakers sought you out for vengeance.

optionText.cn: 碾骨氏族不会听“凶手”的话。
optionText.en: Bonekrushers would not listen to a murderer of their kind.

optionText.cn: 对三名嫌疑人的定罪都还缺证据。
optionText.en: We lack evidence proving the guilt of all three suspects.

optionText.cn: 可惜，我们离真相，还差一步。
optionText.en: A shame. We were pretty close to the truth.
You look bothered.

optionText.cn: 很抱歉，最终没能带给你真相。
optionText.en: Apologies. We failed to deliver the truth.
You thanked me already. Once is enough.

optionText.cn: 有些错误，本就轮不到你来承担。
optionText.en: For starters, you shouldn't be blamed for certain mistakes.
Where are you going?
You're still pursuing your investigation?
Good luck.

optionText.cn: 希望再见时，你已经得到了真相。
optionText.en: Hope you'll find the truth when we meet again.
We accept this task.

optionText.cn: 把他们两个的档案给我一份。
optionText.en: Forward me the profiles of the two suspects.

optionText.cn: 我想了解一下尤莉娅的情况。
optionText.en: I need to know more about Yulia.

optionText.cn: 关于格奥尔基你知道什么？
optionText.en: How much do you know about Georgi?
Good. I'll start the investigation promptly.

optionText.cn: 你对工团里的内鬼有什么看法？
optionText.en: What do you think about the UWST traitors?

optionText.cn: 工人们对这件事作何反应？
optionText.en: How are the crew mates reacting to the audit?
Understood. I'll start investigating at once.

optionText.cn: 能占用你一点儿时间吗？
optionText.en: Can we take a moment of your time?
Greetings. Are you free right now?
We should go look for her right away!

optionText.cn: 看来，我们只能面对面谈一谈了。
optionText.en: An honest face-to-face is our only solution.
You have the right to refuse.

optionText.cn: 我看也没必要继续问了。
optionText.en: I don't think questioning her further would work.
Try to stay low, and don't let anyone hear about this.
I'll leave it in your good hands.

optionText.cn: 那就去你“记混”的地方看看。
optionText.en: Okay. Take us to the place where you made your mistakes.

optionText.cn: 比起堆满工团货物的裂地者营地，确实整洁。
optionText.en: Yes, when compared to LB camps filled with UWST supplies.

optionText.cn: 你最近还挺勤快的，经常连晚上都不休息？
optionText.en: You've been busy. You're not even taking breaks at night.

optionText.cn: 看来问不出什么有用的东西了。
optionText.en: I don't think we can get anything useful out of him.

optionText.cn: 剩下的话你留着对安格鲁讲吧。
optionText.en: Well, good luck convincing Angro.
Keep an eye on him if he comes back.

optionText.cn: 接下来保持静默，不要让他察觉。
optionText.en: Be silent about this. Don't let him find out.

optionText.cn: 没你想的那么复杂……一切大概都源于一场梦。
optionText.en: It's not that complicated... It's all based on a dream.

optionText.cn: 这次故障的源头……本来就是一个梦。
optionText.en: Actually, the malfunction ... stemmed from a dream.
So we're talking about a series of malfunctions?
Need some help?

optionText.cn: 你似乎……并不关心故障能否被解决？
optionText.en: You don't seem to ... care about the broken bots.
This looks like quite a problem.
Sounds like a good idea.
Are you trying to ... fix it?

optionText.cn: 我会尝试……让它恢复精神的。
optionText.en: I will try ... to make it feel better.

optionText.cn: 抱歉，没能让它彻底好起来。
optionText.en: Sorry. I couldn't get it to top-notch condition.

optionText.cn: 你还在继续你的研究吗？
optionText.en: Still working on your project?
Can I have a go at it?
Can we take a look at it?

optionText.cn: 目前正在排查故障的原因。
optionText.en: We're troubleshooting the cause of the errors.
Any new data we can analyze?
How about we let you supervise our work?
Wait. Perlica, look at this—

optionText.cn: 或许是针对新指令的解码？
optionText.en: Perhaps it decrypted a new command.

optionText.cn: 所以才会一心前往“目的地”？
optionText.en: And this is why they're dead set on reaching the "destination"?

optionText.cn: 莫非……指定的“目的地”还有其他意思？
optionText.en: The designated "destination" might mean something else.

optionText.cn: 发信者又开始发送指令了……
optionText.en: Someone has sent out another command...

optionText.cn: 如果我们能立刻反向定位……
optionText.en: If we could backtrack the signal right now...

optionText.cn: 等一下，我突然有了个想法。
optionText.en: Hold on. An idea just came to me.

optionText.cn: 嗯，这下它就能帮我们找到那个“发信者”了。
optionText.en: Yeah. Now the robot can help us find the "sender".

optionText.cn: 输入“加载管理员权限，快速接入指令记录”
optionText.en: Enter "Load Endministrator Authority Level, quick connect to command log"

optionText.cn: 输入“输出最近一条指令的发布者位置”
optionText.en: Enter "Output sender location of last command"
...It should be it.

optionText.cn: 先把不速之客们送走吧。
optionText.en: Let's send these uninvited guests away.
Let me have a go.

optionText.cn: 或许那只是它做的一个梦。
optionText.en: Maybe it had a dream.
Maybe it...

optionText.cn: 对了，你见过这个地方吗？
optionText.en: Hey, have you seen this place before?
The first scene they saw...
And it became their final calling...

optionText.cn: 大概是因为……它们共同做的那个梦醒了。
optionText.en: Perhaps they woke ... from the dream they shared.
Team of professional Endfielders, in fact.
What happened?
A true tragic hero, this one.
How about letting us tag along?
Let's go.
You ready, Mr. Li Zhui?
I need time to prepare.

optionText.cn: 他相信那个迷踪林会吃人的故事。
optionText.en: He believes in the story of the man-eating grove.

optionText.cn: 好朴素，听起来就像简单的生态规律。
optionText.en: Sounds like a simple ecological pattern.

optionText.cn: 洪泥，寨子里的人都在找你。
optionText.en: Hong Ni, the entire Stockade is looking for you.

optionText.cn: 李惴提到的那个天师，去哪里了？
optionText.en: Where did that Tianshi Li Zhui mentioned go?
Li Zhui believes grovenymphs eat people.
Someone suspects changes in ecological patterns.

optionText.cn: 洪泥说是武陵的阴谋所致。
optionText.en: Hong Ni suspects Wuling conspiracy.

optionText.cn: 树就是长叶子的高大植物。
optionText.en: A tree is a large macroflora with leaves.
Yes. The tree is a tree.

optionText.cn: 树是绿的，长耳兽是绿的，所以树是长耳兽。
optionText.en: Trees are long-ears. They're both green.
Me?
The water and the earth played their part.
Thus thought Talos-II.
The cosmos acts in mysterious ways.
Perhaps...
Where's Li Zhui?

optionText.cn: 毕业研究成果，养在清波寨边上？
optionText.en: You're raising your project next to Qingbo Stockade?

optionText.cn: 抱歉，我们不知道是你的……
optionText.en: Apologies. We didn't know she's your...
That long-ear belongs to someone.

optionText.cn: 看来小吴也不是一般人能养的。
optionText.en: Woolsey isn't just anybody's pet.

optionText.cn: 没跑，这是我们换回小吴的食材。
optionText.en: We obviously didn't. Here's your food. Give us Woolsey.

optionText.cn: 还没找到，你再耐心等等。
optionText.en: Patience. Just wait for a bit.
Major Changer? Does she change her major often?

optionText.cn: 阿土跑掉了，好像有点害怕。
optionText.en: Woolsey has escaped. She seems very worried about that.
Why don't you let her graduate?
You're a good instructor.

optionText.cn: 看来小吴知道自己最终的方向。
optionText.en: And it seems Woolsey found a place to settle down.
Why don't you keep it around as a memento?

optionText.cn: 没关系，我们也没有白跑一趟。
optionText.en: Don't sweat it. It wasn't a wasted trip for us.
I believe you can do it!

optionText.cn: 年轻人就应该多多探索。
optionText.en: It's good for young folks to get out and explore.
Made up your mind?

optionText.cn: 但是……草地上有这么多头驮兽，哪一头是它啊？
optionText.en: There are so many of them. Which is your old boy?

optionText.cn: 这里的驮兽也太多了，你能认出它吗？
optionText.en: You got a huge herd right here. Can you find your old boy?
Hello... Excuse me...
Hi there.
Sorry, you two. I got a question.

optionText.cn: 快走！快走！不要再死缠烂打了！
optionText.en: Out you go! SHOO! Chase someone else!

optionText.cn: 小伙子，天涯何处无芳草，它不值得你这样。
optionText.en: This old codger ain't worth your time, young blood.
Sure thing.
Ask away.
What did you remember?

optionText.cn: 你不问那片田在哪里吗？
optionText.en: Aren't you going to ask where the farm is?

optionText.cn: 可你走了一路，不就是想去看看那片田吗？
optionText.en: Thought you came all the way here to see that farm.
You ... you alright?
Need any help?
He's gone... We should leave too.

optionText.cn: 谁家往果汁里面加生姜……？
optionText.en: Ginger? In a fruit punch? Who does that...?
You're still in the mood for arguing?

optionText.cn: 你就让小武把话说完吧。
optionText.en: Just let Little Wu finish, old boy.
Should have no regrets?
So I guess you still regret about something...?
Little Wu, you sure this is the right place?
The lawn...? I thought I was in the Academy.
Was it really a dream?
Was it just a dream?

optionText.cn: 它很特别，和其他驮兽都不一样。
optionText.en: He's really special. The others have nothing on him.

optionText.cn: 它很普通，和其他驮兽没什么差别。
optionText.en: He's really common. Just like all the others.
It's alright. You don't have to find him.

optionText.cn: 只是梦而已……不用太在意。
optionText.en: It's just a dream... Pay no heed to it.
Where did everyone go?
Is the Farmers' Meet over already?
What happened?
They left? Where did they go?

optionText.cn: 还有一头老驮兽，走出门去，消失在人群里了……
optionText.en: An Old Burdenbeast just disappeared into the crowd...
An old Tianshi...
That farm...
Who...? What...? Where...? How...?
Who's that visiting VIP?
Talking about me?
Which of them is Shasha?
All of them? I thought...

optionText.cn: 真的吗？我一点也没看出来……
optionText.en: Really? I'm afraid it's not obvious to me...

optionText.cn: 它的嘴角好像比其他驮兽的多上扬了五度。
optionText.en: Totally. Only his mouth has that extra 5-degree tilt.

optionText.cn: 听起来是个爱喝水的宝宝，我能摸摸它吗？
optionText.en: Sounds like a thirsty little buddy. Can I pet her?
Let me pet you, Miaomiao.
Uh... I'll skip the petting.

optionText.cn: ……好像不太聪明的样子，它的饲养员是谁啊？
optionText.en: ...This one looks a little slow. Who raised her?

optionText.cn: 傻乎乎的，饲养员怎么不在身边？
optionText.en: Looks like a dumbobeast to me. Where's the farmer?

optionText.cn: 咳咳，所以你找我到底是因为什么事，小朋友？
optionText.en: Ahem. So why look for me, little buddy?
What's going on, boy?

optionText.cn: 哎，你别哭哇，没事，我去看看。
optionText.en: Oh dear. This is nothing to cry about. I'll go look for your old boy.
...Where's this pen? Take me there, now.

optionText.cn: 等我找到丢失的驮兽就回来。
optionText.en: I'll be back once I find the missing burdenbeast.
I'll vote once I'm back.
Oh... She's yours.

optionText.cn: 对不起，是憨态可掬！一点儿也不傻。
optionText.en: Apologies. Dumdum can be cute too! And she's looking smarter already.

optionText.cn: 小武，你最后看到驮兽是在哪里？
optionText.en: Where did you last see the burdenbeast, Little Wu?
Lemme take a look.
Maybe he's feeling unwell.
(Did this burdenbeast just say something?)
(Am I hearing things?!)

optionText.cn: （这些职农没听到它在讲话吗？）
optionText.en: (These farmers didn't hear the burdenbeast talk.)

optionText.cn: （难道只有我一个人听到了吗？）
optionText.en: (Am I the only one who heard it?)

optionText.cn: 和小武回去吧，你到处乱跑，他都快急死了。
optionText.en: Just head back. Wu was worried when you went missing.

optionText.cn: 你身体不好，还是早点回到兽栏休息吧。
optionText.en: You're sick. You should rest in your pen.

optionText.cn: 那你怎么跑到这里来了？
optionText.en: So why are you here?
Is this ... the farm?
Really?
You're not playing me for a fool, right?
You're feeling it ... right?

optionText.cn: 这里是你要找的地方吗？
optionText.en: Is this the farm you're looking for?
Come on. We're getting close.

optionText.cn: 你确定吗？我们才走了没几步路。
optionText.en: You sure? We hardly got started.

optionText.cn: 我从商店给你买一瓶水？
optionText.en: How about bottled water from the store?

optionText.cn: 我在附近给你打一壶水？
optionText.en: How about a cask of water from a nearby pond?
Xiran what...?
Can you repeat that?

optionText.cn: 是武陵城有了许多变化。
optionText.en: Wuling City has changed quite a bit.

optionText.cn: 驮兽也参与了武陵城的建设吗？
optionText.en: Did burdenbeasts help in the building of Wuling City?

optionText.cn: 原来当时建设武陵城，驮兽的牺牲也不亚于天师。
optionText.en: You burdenbeasts are pretty heroic, just like the Tianshi.

optionText.cn: 怪不得武陵城内的人们这样喜欢驮兽。
optionText.en: No wonder city folks like keeping you around.

optionText.cn: 怪不得武陵城有这么多驮兽。
optionText.en: That's why there are so many of you in the city.
Oh dear... Stop arguing with Little Wu.
Why are you *here*?

optionText.cn: 你为什么没在原地等我？
optionText.en: Why didn't you wait for me there?

optionText.cn: 别慌，它脚步慢，我们先追上去看看！
optionText.en: Don't worry. He's pretty slow. We'll easily catch up.

optionText.cn: 慢着……你有没有闻到一股……
optionText.en: Wait... Do you smell something...?

optionText.cn: 从留下的痕迹来看，它应该没进学院。
optionText.en: From his prints, he shouldn't be in the Academy.

optionText.cn: 看样子，它直接往市民广场去了。
optionText.en: He seems to have gone straight to the Citizen Square.

optionText.cn: 当时的工作已经繁重到要给驮兽喂功能饮料了吗？
optionText.en: Energy drinks? Really? How much work did you have?

optionText.cn: （小声）有没有可能，你其实是被虐待了？
optionText.en: (Whispering) Were you ... overworked? Abused?
Sure can do.
No problem.

optionText.cn: 奇怪，明明我拍摄前它还在的……
optionText.en: He was still there till I took out the camera...
Maybe it's a lighting issue.
Wait. Look. There's a trail of footprints in the photo.
Hold on. I see footprints in the photo...
City outskirts? What's there?

optionText.cn: 驮兽们去城郊会做什么？
optionText.en: Why would burdenbeasts go there? What's in the outskirts?
